item.text: (da) @#/ ! /'dul ba lung bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 律師戒行經第十一部
'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/ khyod kyi 'dod pa gnas bzang por skyes
te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dang phrad par bdag gis bya'o/ /des de rgyal po
shar pa dang lhan cig phrad par byas te/ nor lhas byin de dang lhan cig shin tu chags par gyur pa dang /
gser phreng can gyis sbyor ba 'chang la lha ni gson te/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi sras mo nor lhas byin
la glang po che'i cho ga slob po zhes spring ngo / /des kyang rgyan lnga mi mngon par byas nas bdag nyid gos hrul po
bgos te ming dpyid ldan zhes bya bar btags nas smyon pa'i cha lugs kyis 'phags rgyal du song ngo / /de
der lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu rgyug mchong rgal zhing dpyid ldan dga'o
zhes smyon tshig kyang smra'o/ /gang dag gis 'di sbyor ba 'chang ba yin no zhes de ngo shes pa de dag la ni des

rgyan byin pa dang / de dag gis de blangs nas cang mi zer bar 'gro'o/ /gang dag mi shes pa de dag ni 'di smyon pa zhig go zhes yal bar gtong ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang khyim bzang po gang du zhugs pa der bza' ba dang / me tog dang

gos dag kyang rnyed cing shar pa dang lhan cig gsang ste gros gcig go/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nor lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar pa'i bu la smras pa/ lha gal te na bdag gi phas tshor du mchis tshur spyon 'bros so/ /des smras pa/

lha mo gal te de lta na song la pha la 'di skad ces yab bdag gis glang po che'i cho ga ni lobs na 'on kyang las su bgyi ba ma mthong ste/ de'i slad du lhas bdag la glang po che mo bzang ldan ci bder bgyid du stsol cig dang de la 'tshal

nas las dag blta bar bgyi'o zhes gyis shig /de song nas rgyal po la de bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang glang po che'i rdzi rnams la shes ldan dag glang po che mo bzang ldan bu mo nor lhas byin la ci bder

gyis la/ de la zhon nas las dag ltar chug shig ces bsgo'o/ /de dag gis de la glang po che mo bzang ldan ci bder byas pa dang / de rgyal po shar pa'i bu dang lhan cig de la zhon nas 'bros pa'i thabs shom par rtsom ste/ res 'ga'

ni snga dro song zhing nyi ma phyed na slar 'ong / res 'ga' ni nyi ma phyed na song zhing phyi dro slar 'ong / res 'ga' ni phyi dro song nas rgongs su slar 'ong / res 'ga' ni rgongs song nas mtshan mo nam phyed na slar 'ong / res 'ga' ni 'jing la slar

'ong / res 'ga' ni lnga tshigs la slar 'ong / res 'ga' ni nam chung na slar 'ong / res 'ga' ni skya reng shar na slar 'ong ngo / /shar pas sbyor ba 'chang la 'bros pa'i thabs smras pa dang / des glang po che'i lci ba dag phyir dbyung bar

brtsams so/ /chab sgo ba dag gis smras pa/ dpyid ldan 'di ci yin/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i bshos su byas te 'di dag der la dur 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / de dag gis bgad nas 'di ni smyon pa'o snyam

nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des kyang de dag khyer te kau sham+bi'i lam gyi bar bar du shing gi yal ga la spyangs so/ /yang glang po che'i gcin dag gis bum pa bkang ste bkur bar brtsams pa dang / sgo ba dag gis de bzhin du dris pa

dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i bshos su byas te 'di ni der skyems su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / de dag de bzhin du 'di ni smyon pa yin no snyam nas bgad de 'khod do/ /des kyang de khyer te kau'u sham+bi'i lam gyi bar bar du

shing gi yal ga la spyangs so/ /rgyal po shar pa dang / sbyor ba 'chang dang / gser phreng can gyis nyi ma che ge mo zhig la phyogs che ge mo zhig tu thams cad 'du bar bya'o zhes dus btab nas rgyal po shar pa'i bu dang / nor

lhas byin glang po che mo bzang ldan la zhon nas phyogs der song ste/ sbyor ba 'chang dang / gser phreng can yang de nyid la zhon te/ de rnams pi bang snyan pa len zhing dong ba na/ rgyal po shar pa'i bus pi bang snyan pa

blangs pa dang / sbyor ba 'chang dga' ba skyes te glu blangs pa/ bzang ldan ma dang byangs snyan dang / /nor lhas byin dang shar pa dang / /gser phreng can dang dpyid ldan dang / /'di dag don 'thun 'dong ba yin/ /dus gang du de dag

slar 'ong ba'i dus de yang myur du thal/ dus tha ma gang yin pa de yang thal nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gsos pa la smras pa/ gsos pa nor lhas byin deng thogs na 'di ci las gyur ces byas pa dang / gsos pas btsal

bar brtsams pa las ma rnyed nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ rgyal po shar pa'i bus glang po che mo bzang ldan la 'tshal te nor lhas byin khrid nas bros lags so/ /rgyal po sngangs nas smras pa/ gsos pa myur du song la glang po

che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te shar pa dang / nor lhas byin khrid de shog shig /de rings pa rings par glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon nas bsnyags so/ /des bsnyags te slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang gis glang po che'i lci ba'i thum po

bshig pa dang / 'dam bu'i ris de bsnam par brtsams so/ /ji srid snom pa de'i bar du glang po che mo bzang ldan gyis dpag tshad bcu 'das so/ /yang 'dam bu'i ris slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang gis gcin gyi bum pa gcag pa dang

'dam bu'i ris de bsnams par brtsams so/ /ji srid snom pa de'i bar du glang po che mo bzang ldan gyis dpag tshad gzhan bcu 'das te/ gzhan gyi yul du phyin par gyur pa dang / gsos pas bsams pa 'di ni gzhan gyi yul yin pas glang po

che 'dam bu'i ri yang shor du 'ong gis ldog go snyam nas de re thag chad de slar log go/ /rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis smras pa/ gsos pa ci grag /des smras pa/ lha ci zhig gda' bros lags mod ces byas pa dang / rgyal po lag

pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ /rgyal po shar pa'i bu yang srog stor ba las slar rnyed de/ kau sham+bir 'ongs nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / phu nu dang / gnyen rnams

la sbyin pa dag byin zhing dga' ston chen po byas nas nor lhas byin dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /dus gzhan zhig na khang bzangs kyi thog tu byung nas nor lhas byin dang lhan cig tu bre mo gtam dag

zer zhing 'khod pa las smras pa/ lha mo khyod kyang ngas de ltar sgyus phrogs pa yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha khyod kyang de bzhin du bdag gi phas thabs kyis bzung ste bzhag pa lags so/ /des smras pa/ lha mo ci ste khyod kyi pha 'dir bkug ste

tha ga pa'i las slob du ma bcug na/ nga rgyal po shar pa'i bu ma yin du zad ces byas pa dang / de khros bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /rgyal po shar pas sbyor ba 'chang la smras pa/ nga'i mi dga' ba khyod kyis bsal bar nus sam/ lha ci zhig bgyi/ rgyal

po gtum po rab snang mgul pa nas thogs te 'dir khug la tha ga pa'i las slob tu chug shig /des smras pa/ lha gang gi tshe khyod kyis nor lhas byin dang glang po che mo bzang ldan phrogs pa'i tshe don gyis na khyod kyi mi dgyes pa bstsal

lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang gal te rngo thog kyang gdas bsams te bgyi'o zhes byas te/ des 'phags rgyal du 'gro ba'i zong dag sta gon byas nas ded dpon spro ba bskyed de/ smad 'tshong ma gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa

zhig kyang ded dpon gyi chung mar byas nas de rim gyis grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rnams su tshong dus dag lta zhing 'phags rgyal du phyin to/ /rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis nor mang po dang ldan pa'i ded dpon

zhig 'ongs so zhes thos so/ /des thos nas kyang bdag nyid nor rtsir song ste des 'dron po de dag la dris pa/ shes ldan dag ded dpon gyi khyim gang yin/ de dag gis ded dpon gyi khyim ni 'di yin no zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po der song ste sgor

'dug nas ded dpon gang na 'dug ces dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ sgor byung ste song ngo / /des smras pa/ 'di na su 'dug de rnams kyis smras pa/ ded dpon gyi chung ma mchis so/ /des sgo gtan phye ste nang du zhugs pa dang ji tsam na ded dpon gyi

chung ma gzugs dang na tshod bzang bas 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhig mthong ngo / /des de mthong nas kyang rab tu chags par gyur te smras pa/ bzang mo nga dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na ded dpon gyi sho

gam gtang ngo / /des smras pa/ gal te de lta na mal 'dir 'dug shig ces byas pa dang / 'dod chags kyis log par gyur pas ni mi bya ba ci yang med pa'i phyir de der 'dug pa dang / rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis sgo bcad de khyogs su bcug nas

mi bzhis bteg ste glu len cing sgo cig nas 'phags rgyal du zhugs so/ /de na kha cig ni thal mo rdob/ kha cig ni rgod/ kha cig ni 'di skad du glu len te/ sbrang ma dag gis zla ba zos/ /rnam thos bu ni gnyer pas ded/ /sa gzhi nags

bcas mkha' la 'phags/ /smad 'tshong mas ni rab snang khrid/ /ces byas pa dang / 'phags rgyal na gnas pa rnams kyis bsams pa/ ci'i phyir tshong pa 'di dag de skad ces zer snyam pa las/ de rnams sgo gzhan du byung ste/ smyags bcad

de bros te song ngo / /gsos pa yang phan tshun du rgyal po tshol zhing de rim gyis kau sham+bir song ngo / /blon po dag gis rgyal po shar pa la smras pa/ lha dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ rgyal po rab snang ni 'dir khugs lags so zhes byas pa dang /

rgyal po shar pas smras pa/ shes ldan dag deng la de thogs te tha ga pa'i las slob tu chug shig /rgyal po rab snang 'dir 'ongs par nor lhas byin la su yang ma zer cig par khrims su yang chos shig ces bsgo'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na

rgyal po shar pa'i bu nor lhas byin dang lhan cig tu khang bzangs kyi steng du byung ste 'dug pa na rgyal po gtum po rab snang thags kyi gra khang nas bya ba zhig gi phyir sgor byung ba dang rgyal po shar pas de mthong nas/ des nor lhas byin la smras pa/ mi

'o ni su yin khyod kyis shes sam/ des kyang ring zhig du brtags pa dang / rgyal po de spyi gcer yin pas ngo shes nas de mchi mas brnangs bzhin du 'dug ste des bsams pa/ rgyal po ngan pa 'dis nga'i pha 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs

su byas kyis gal te rgyal po ngan pa 'di ma bsad na nor lhas byin ma yin du zad/ ji ltar bsad pa yang bdag nyid kyis mi tshor ba de ltar gsad do snyam mo/ /rgyal po de yang yid rno ba zhig pas de khros par shes nas des sbyor ba 'chang la

bsgo ba/ sbyor ba 'chang dgra la sha lon zin gyis song la rgyal po gtum po rab snang khrol te khrus gyis zan byin la bkur sti chen pos 'phags rgyal du skyol cig ces bsgo ba dang / des kyang ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du 'phags rgyal du

bskyal to/ /nor lhas byin gyis bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di nga nyid gsad pa'i thabs brtsams na g.yon can 'dis 'phrigs par 'ong bas dus chung zhig gis bar du brid do snyam nas/ des de la re shig cung zad cig rgad pa dang /

dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dag gis brid do/ /de nas de gos dri ma can gyon te khri'u dra ba can la nyal zhing 'dug pa dang / rgyal po shar pa'i bus smras pa/ lha mo 'di ci'i tha tshig /des smras pa/ lha lha rnams 'khrugs lags so/ /

des smras pa/ lha mo mi bdog gam/ ci ji ltar dam bcas pa gzhan gyis shig /des smras pa/ lha gang bdag gis dam bcas pa de mi 'grub lags mod/ rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod kyis dam ci bcas/ gang gis na khyod mi dga' bar gyur pa smros shig

dang thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod mi dga' bar ma byed cig /des smras pa/ gang gi tshe bdag gi phas lha bzung ste bzhag pa de'i tshe bdag gis lha la 'di skad du ci ste lha dang bdag lhan cig bde legs su kau sham+bir phyin na/ der lha dang bdag lhan

cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du zas mi bza' zhing zhag bdun 'das nas/ lha ni me tog gi phreng bas rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du dkris te ra ba'i khar 'dug par bya'o/ /bdag ni dka' thub rdzogs nas bram ze stong la zan byin la mchod pa dang bkur sti

cher bya'o zhes dam bcas na da lta btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che bar gyur pas ci'i slad du 'di lta bu mdzad par 'gyur snyam du bdag de sems shing mchis te/ mdor na gum lags su bas so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ lha mo khyod kyis lha la gsol ba btab

pa yang don gyis na nga'i ched kho na yin pas longs shig dang thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes byas pa dang / de langs te des khyi gu gnyis shig ra ba'i drung du btags te bzhag nas/ de ji tsam mi tsam gyi sha za nus pa de tsam du sha gong nas gong du bskyed de

byin no/ /gang gi tshe khyi gu de gnyis sha de tsam za nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po dang lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dug cing de ni mtshan mo za/ rgyal po shar pa ni chung ma de la chags pas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du ma zos pas de lus skya bo bseng bseng por

gyur cing sha bri ngan pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rmya bar gyur to/ /zhag bdun lon pa dang nor lhas byin gyis me tog phreng rgyud mkhan rnams la yang rgyus pa dag gis me tog dri zhim po dag rgyus la myur du khyer te shog shig ces bsgo'o/ /sbyor ba 'chang la

yang deng du lha'i dka' thub rdzogs kyis khyod kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la bram ze stong dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zan sbyor cig ces bsgo'o/ /blon po gzhan

dag ni mi tshor bar bya ba'i phyir gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag tu las su bskos so/ /sbyor ba 'chang yang rgyal po la snying nye zhing rjes su chags pas grong khyer de rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo ni med par byas/ tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/ bdug pa

dri zhim po'i pog phor ni bzhag /rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag ni sgreng / mu tig dang / dar gyi chun po dang / lda ldi ni spyangs/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ni bkram ste lha rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas nas gnas

deng gnas rnams su rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs ni bsgrags/ gar mkhan dang / snyan dngags mkhan dang / 'jo tshar can gyi bro mkhan rnams kyis ni bro gar bya bar brtsams so/ /ca co chen po byung ba de'i tshe nor lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar ba'i bu ra ba'i khar

rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du me tog gis dkris nas bsnyal lo/ /de nas ra ba'i kha nas phul nas lhung ma thag tu gson por khyi dag gis rus gong 'ba' shig lus par byas te/ bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / wa dang / mi ro la za ba'i srog chags gzhan

dag kyang 'thab par gyur to/ /kau sham+bir lha ra ba'i kha nas grong khyer mdzes pa lta ba las lhung ste/ khyi dag gis zos so zhes ku co'i sgra cher gyur pa dang / de na kha cig ni ngu / kha cig ni dga'/ kha cig ni tha mal par 'dug /kha cig ni 'phrog rlom byed

par gyur to/ /ku co chen po byung ba de'i tshe kau sham+bi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag so sor bros nas kha cig ni mnyan yod du song ngo / /kha cig ni gnas gzhan dang gzhan du song ngo / /skabs der sbyor ba 'chang ba dang / blon po gzhan rnams dang / kau sham+bi na gnas

pa'i mi'i gtso bo dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis ku cho zhi bar byas te de nas sbyor ba 'chang gis ji ltar rgyal po ra ba'i khar song ngo / /ji ltar ra ba'i drung na khyi 'dug par gyur ces kun tu brtag par brtsams so/ /des de ltar brtags pa dang / nor

lhas byin gyis ji ltar thabs kyis bsad pa rtsad chod de de khros nas nor lhas byin rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs so/ /dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun

pa rgyal po shar ba'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas khyi dag gis 'tshal te dus las 'das lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po shar ba'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur

ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag rgyal po shar ba'i bus las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan sus so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa

rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag kho na la rnam par

smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na bram ze mdun na 'don zhig 'dug go/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba

med pa na rang sangs rgyas phongs pa dang / dman pa la thugs brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal dag la dga' ba/ sbyin gnas gcig pur gyur pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung bas rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu ba rgyu zhing ri 'or der phyin pa dang / phyogs zhig tu nub mo gnas so/ /

de phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs nas ri 'or gyi grong der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / mdun na 'don de yang khyi khrid nas phyir byung ste/ des rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa de la khyi sbad do/ /

dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ mdun na 'don gang yin pa de ni rgyal po shar ba'i bu 'di yin te/ 'dis de'i tshe de'i dus na rang sangs rgyas nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa la khyi sbad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar khyis zos

nas dus las 'das te/ da ltar gyi bar du yang khyis zos te dus las 'das par gyur to/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/ 'dren ma

rnams kyi yang 'dren ma ste/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang / 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag kho na la brtsal bar byas te/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad

ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal po shar ba'i bu dus las 'das nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'gran zla med par rgyal po byed par gyur to/ /de dus gzhan zhig na khang

bzangs kyi steng du byung nas blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor te gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer zhing 'khod de/ shes ldan dag grong dang grong khyer dang gnas gang na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rdo 'jog na smad 'tshong ma bzang

mo zhes bgyi ba gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi la mkhas pa zhig mchis te/ mthong ma thag tu chags par mi 'gyur ba'i mi gang lags pa de ni sa'i steng na 'ga' yang ma mchis so/ /rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i

gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa thos nas thos ma thag tu chags par gyur te smras pa/ gsos pa ci byas kyang mi phan de lta bu'i bud med la dga' mgur spyad dgos pas rdo 'jog tu song ste de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/ /des smras

pa lha rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi gshed mar gyur pa/ phyir rgol bar gyur pa/ mi mdza' bar gyur pa lags la/ de ni rtag tu rdo 'jog na mchis lags pas ci ste lha rdo 'jog tu gshegs na gdon mi 'tshal bar des lha brlag

par bgyid lags so/ /des smras pa/ mi rnams kyi nang na mi gzu lums can dag lta yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni 'di la 'dug shig /nga ni 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ ci ste lha de lta bur dgyes na lha nyid mkhyen mod kyi/ 'on kyang bag mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /

rgyal po rab snang bud med la brkam chags can yin pas des de'i tshig ma mnyan nas glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te rdo 'jog tu song ngo / /de rim gyis song nas gtun shing ri la phyin pa dang / des der glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bzhag nas rdo 'jog

tu song ngo / /de nas mu tig gi do shal srang brgya stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te bzang mo gzugs kyis 'tsho ba'i gan du song nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag

dag shes ldan dag rgyal po mi snang na gar bzhud ces dpyod pa la zhugs pa dang / de na kha cig gis smras pa/ de ci mi phal pa yin nam/ des na mi mngon mngon par 'gyur du zad kyi/ de gar yang ni ma bzhud do/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che

ba yin pas ci'i phyir phyi rol tu 'byung ste/ btsun mo'i 'khor nyid na dga' ba dang rtsed mo so sor nyams su myong bar byed do/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la the tshom byar ci yod/ tshur sheg gsos pa la 'drir 'dong ngo / /kha cig gis legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes

smras nas de dag thams cad 'dus te gsos pa'i drung du dong nas smras pa/ gsos pa lha mi snang na ga shed du ma bzhud grang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci rings mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis smras pa/ gsos pa ji srid na mthong bar 'gyur/ des smras pa/ lo

bcu gnyis lon nas so/ /de dag khros nas smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir de skad smra ba las na gdon mi za bar khyod kyis lha bsad nas bdag nyid rgyal srid byed par 'dod do/ /de'i phyir re shig gal te zhag bdun na lha ltar yod na de lta na legs ji ste med na ni nged

kyis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes byas pa dang / de cang mi zer bar lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas thos nas bos te dris pa/ gsos pa khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de

sems khongs su chud cing 'dug /des smras pa/ lha mo bram ze dag 'di skad ces mchi na ji ltar sems khongs su chud cing mi mchis/ des smras pa/ gsos pa gal te de lta na song la nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa gser snod kyi nang du lugs

te/ rta mang lag la rgyus pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du zhog la 'di skad ces gang zhig nged nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro ba de nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo shig ces smros la de ltar bya ste rta bzang po gang gis zos pa nged la sbron

cig /gsos pas ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du byas na 'ga' yang za bar spro ba med do/ /phyogs gzhan zhig na rta rid rke ba lus rmya bar gyur pa/ ngan ma za ba/ dbugs rgod pa/ rna ba chag pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung du de song ste mdun du 'dug nas/ gang

zhig nged nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro ba de nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo shig ces smras pa dang / des de dag zos so/ /gsos pa song nas/ ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gsos pa song

la stod cig /gal te stod pa'i tshe mi srun byed na khyod kyis ma 'jigs par spungs skyed cig /sems stobs dang ldan pa la ni sus kyang mi rdzi'o/ /de song nas de bstad par brtsams pa dang / de stod pa'i tshe rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs su

bdag nyid sprul nas/ kwa'i mi khyod kyis sngon chad 'di lta bu'i rta mthong ba 'ga' yod dam zhes smras so/ /des ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsdigs nas kwa'i rta'i srin po khyod kyis sngon chad rta zhon pa su la yang lcag 'di lta bu mthong ba yod

dam zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa/ kye mi sngon ma mthong ngo / /des kye rta'i srin po gal te re shig mi srun mi byed na de lta na legs/ ci ste byed na mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la dor bar bya'o/ /des smras pa/ kye mi ci ste de lta na gal te bdag

phyir 'dir khrid de mi 'ong bar dam 'cha' na 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin dus byas 'dong ngo zhes smras nas/ des de la zhon te song nas rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin to/ /rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis mthong nas smras pa/ gsos pa

'ongs sam/ des smras pa/ lha mchis so/ /dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir zhes byas pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa re shig zhag bdun gyi bar du rtses la zhag bdun 'das pa dang dus shes par bya'o/ /

zhes byas nas zhag bdun gyi bar du gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad de zhag bdun 'das nas song ngo / /gtun shing rir phyin nas bdag nyid kyis glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bstad par brtsams pa dang /

des bstad pa na skad phyung ba/ de dang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze ltas mkhan long ba zhig gnas pa des thos nas/ des smras pa/ glang po che'i gtso bo 'di'i skad dang sbyar na/ 'di ni 'di nas dpag tshad brgyar song nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po

las chu 'thung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po rab snang dang gsos pa glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te song ngo / /re shig cig na phyogs shig na rdza mkhan zhig 'dug pa de'i snod so ma btang ba dag cig 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas brdzis nas rdza

mkhan gyis mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang / gsos pas smras pa/ gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po rnams ni khwa bzhin khu 'phrig za ba yin pas rgyal po rab snang gis bsams pa/ gsos pa 'di bdag la zur za ste/

de ci bdag gcig pu sas 'tsho ba yin nam mjal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo / /yang phyogs shig na thing ril gyis lam kar tshang bcas pa de'i sgo nga dag 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas bcom nas des kyang mya ngan bya bar brtsams

pa dang / gsos pas smras pa/ gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po rab snang de bzhin du rtogs pa skyes nas bsams pa/ yang 'di bdag la zur za ste/ ci smad 'tshong ma bdag gi spyod yul ma yin nam mjal

to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo / /yang 'dam bu'i ri shing drung na mar song ba dang / shing de'i yal ga la sbrul zhig gnas pa des bsnyabs nas rgyal po rab snang bza' bar brtsams so/ /re shig na gsos pas mthong nas des de ral

gri shubs nas phyung ste dum bu dum bur gtubs nas sa la bor ba dang g.yo zhing 'gul ba gsos pas bltas te smras pa/ gang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po rab snang de kho na bzhin du

rtog pa skyes nas bsams pa/ 'di bdag la lan gsum gyi bar du zur za ste/ ci smad 'tshong ma bdag gis don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nam mjal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo / /dus gzhan zhig na 'dam bu'i ri bang

theg ste song nas/ rgyal pos de bzung ba dang ma thub nas gsos pas smras pa/ lha bram ze ltas mkhan gyis 'di dpag tshad brgyar song nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyi de'i slad du myur du

shing gi yal ga la 'jus te glang po che thong shig ces byas pa dang / des myur ba myur bar shing gi yal ga la 'jus so/ /gsos pas kyang shing gi yal ga la 'jus pa dang 'dam bu'i ri 'das te song ngo / /rgyal pos gsos pa la smras pa/

gsos pa song la ma tshor bar zhi ba la lha ni byon nas bskyed mos tshal na bzhugs so zhes gyis shig /de song nas de la brjod pa dang / de dga' ba skyes nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ /rgyal pos kyang stor khung nas 'dzul bar brtsams pa

las/ re shig na bu mo gnyis shig bshang sar byung ba dang / de na gcig gis smras pa/ grogs mo lha 'ongs so zhes grag go/ /gcig shos kyis de stor khung nas 'dzul lo zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos thos nas des bsams pa/ gsos pa

la bdag gis khyod kyis ma tshor bar zhi ba la smros shig ces bsgo na des khyim na 'dug pa ril la smras so snyam du bsams te de khros nas des gsos pa la ji ltar gyur pa dran par byas nas glan ka btsal ba/ gsos pa khyod ko nga la gnod pa

byed par zhugs pa lta nga gcig pu sas 'tsho ba yin nam/ ci na gang gi phyir khyod nga la phyogs che ge mo zhig tu gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur za/ smad 'tshong ma nga'i spyod yul ma yin nam ci na yang phyogs shig tu gang dag

spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur za/ smad 'tshong ma ngas don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nam ci na yang phyogs shig tu yang gang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur za/

da gzod kyang nga skyed mos tshal na 'dug pas khyod song la ma tshor bar zhi ba la lha byon te skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so zhes gyis shig ces bsgo bsgo na/ khyod kyis khyim na 'dug pa ril la smras pas khyod ni nga la gnod pa byed par zhugs so/ /de dogs shing

mi dga' nas yid ches par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/ lha sdig pas ni brlag ste bdag gis lha la zur bgyis pa ma mchis so/ /bdag gis lha la ji ltar zur bgyis/ lha 'di skad du gnas che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di

ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni phyogs der rdza mkhan gyi snod so ma btang ba dag cig 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas brdzis nas rdza mkhan des mya ngan bgyi bar brtsams pa dang / bdag gis de las bsams nas/ 'di skad

du gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par bas so/ /phyogs che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni phyogs der srog

chags thing ril gyi sgo nga dag cig 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas bcom nas de yang mya ngan byed par brtsams pa dang / bdag gis de las bsams nas 'di skad du gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par bas so/ /

phyogs che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag don du gnyer ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni phyogs der shing gi yal ga la sbrul zhig gnas pa des bsnyabs nas lha bza'

bar brtsams pa dang / bdag gis ral gri shubs nas phyung ste dum bu dum bur bcad nas de sa la lhung ba dang / bdag gis de las bsams nas/ 'di skad du gang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes

bgyis par bas so/ /ngas khyod la ma tshor bar zhi ba la lha skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so zhes gyis shig ces byas na khyod kyis khyim na gnas pa ril la smras so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa de yang bdag gis ma tshor ba kho nar zhi ba la

bgyis na bdag ji ltar lha la gnod pa bgyid par zhugs pa lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis nga la lan thams cad legs par glan na/ da gzod nga stor khung nas 'dzul ba na nga bdag nyid kyis bud med gnyis shig

las gcig gis grogs mo lha byon to zhes grag go zhes byas pa dang / gcig shos na re de stor khung nas 'dzul lo zhes zer ba thos na de sus byas zhig gu lha de dag ni phra men ma lags na lags kyang 'tshal mod/ der yang bdag gis lha

la gnod pa ma bgyis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de de lta yin mod kyi ngas khyod bgams par zad kyis mi dga' bar ma byed cig /'on kyang nga rdo 'jog tu song ba'i tshe bram ze gang dag gis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang

bskur bar brtsams pa de dag thag gzhug pa'i dus 'di yin pas de rnams gsad par bya'o/ /des smras pa/ lha bram ze rnams re shig gzhag tu gsol/ phra men ma de rnams je dgum par bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa de rnams ji

ltar gsad par nus/ lha bdag gis de rnams khums pa'i thabs shig bgyi'o/ /gsos pa legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces byas pa dang / gsos pas mdun na 'don gyi khye'u rig sngags smra ba mkhas pa zhig yod pa de'i drung du song

nas bu phra men ma 'di dag skye bo mang po gsod par byed na/ de dag gzung bar bya ba'i thabs de 'ga' yod dam zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa/ yab ci bgyir mchis bdag gis gzung bar bas so/ /bu legs so zhes byas pa dang / des mi'i

lag pa las ut+pal 'dra bar bsgyur nas mi'i lag tu bskur te smras pa/ kye mi khyod song la srang du phyin nas 'dug la/ su rin gyis nyo ba de la ma sbyin par gang zhig mthong na rgod pa de'i ming dris te glegs bu la bris shig /des de thogs te 'dug

nas gang zhig rin gyis nyo ba de la mi ster/ gang zhig mthong nas dgod pa de'i ming ni dris nas glegs bu la 'bri bar byed de/ des de ltar 'phags rgyal gyi phra men ma lnga brgya'i ming dris nas bris so/ /de nas gsos pa la bstan nas gsos

pas kyang rgyal po la bstan pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa phra men ma mang po 'di dag ci ltar kha btag /des smras pa/ lha de rnams ji ltar dgum pa'i thabs bdag la 'tshal gyis lha thugs khral bskyung du gsol/ des

smras pa/ gsos pa legs te khyod nyid shes so/ /des 'phags rgyal gyi phyogs shig tu 'khor gyi khyams shig byas nas/ des lha ni ma'i dam tshig la 'jug gis 'phags rgyal na srin mo ji snyed gnas pa thams cad 'khor gyi khyams su 'du bar

gyis shig ces dril bsgrags pa dang / de dag gis bsams pa/ lha 'khor gyi khyams su ma'i dam tshig la 'jug pa der bdag cag la rdzas bzang po mang du ster gyis 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas gang dag mi mngon par 'dug 'dug pa de dag kyang rnyed pa la chags

pas bdag nyid nye bar bstan te srin mo lnga brgya lhag tsam 'khor gyi khyams su lhags so/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu des de dag thams cad rig sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang / gsos pas kyang de rnams kha btag go/ /rgyal pos

'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams bos nas shes ldan dag gis phra men ma 'di snyed cig bsad pas bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed kyis/ khyod kyis bdag 'khor ba'i dgon pa de las dbyung ba'i phyir nyin cig bzhin 'khor gyi

khyams su 'du zhing zan zo shig ces bsgo ba dang / de rnams kyis shis pa brjod pa byas nas khas blangs so/ /rgyal po rab snang gis sgo ba la bsgo ba/ kye skyes bu bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyams su zan zos nas 'gro ba de dag thams

cad khyod kyis legs par grongs te nga la snyod cig /des smras pa/ lha de ltar bgyi ste gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la yang bsgo ba shes ldan dag 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyams

su zan za ba thams cad la kha zas bsod pa phal cher byin cig /bram ze rnams ni phal cher lto mdun can yin pas rgyal po des de ltar byed du bcug go zhes thos nas thams cad lhags nas zan bza' bar brtsams so/ /de rnams

zan zos nas 'khor gyi khyams nas phyir byung ba dang / sgo bas bgrangs na lhag chad med par bram ze brgyad khri byung ste/ des rgyal po la lha lhag chad ma mchis par bram ze brgyad khri mchis so zhes gsol to/ /rgyal pos gang gis na 'di

rnams dus gcig tu mgo bcad pa'i thabs de gang yin snyam du bsams nas des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ bram ze zan za ba re re'i rgyab tu gshed ma mi ral gri thogs pa re re zhog la/ gang gi tshe ngas zho 'on cig ces smras pa de'i tshe

thams cad kyi mgo chod cig /rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de ltar byas pa dang / 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams las 'chi bdag gi zhags pas zin pa brgyad khri tham pa 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus pa de dag sbyor ba des gcig car

mgo bcad do/ /de na 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze las bram ze brgyad khri rgyal po rab snang gis bsad do/ /des de dag bsad nas nub mo mal chen por nyal ba na rmi lam du sa bla'i sgra drug dang / bar snang gi sgra drug ni thos/ rmi lam

rnam pa brgyad ni mthong ngo / /sa bla'i sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drug /med/ bdag /ngan/ sems/ bdag cag 'di rnams shes bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni 'dir tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po yin no/ /de la drug ces bya ba

las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ lo ni stong phrag drug bcu dang / /lo ni brgya phrag drug bcu ru/ /sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi/ /nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ /med ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ mtha' med

mtha' lta ga la yod/ /nga dang khyed cag nyid kyis ni/ /mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar sdig pa'i las byas so/ /bdag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag /'thun dang mi 'thun pas

bsgrubs pa/ /gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur/ /ngan zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di na bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan/ /bdag cag gang bdog de ma btang / /longs spyod dag ni yod

pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid la ni phan ma byas/ /sems shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ sems kyis su ni bslus gyur cing / /mi shes pas ni bdas gyur pa/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyis/ /gnya' ni su zhig

byed par gyur/ /bdag cag 'di rnams shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru/ /song ste dge ba mang byas nas/ /de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing / /shis pas byas rnams mtho ris 'dong / /bar snang

gi sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad/ su/ gang / da ni/ de rnams/ 'di dag ces bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po yin no/ /de la thams cad ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ thams cad

gsog tu phyung zin te/ /'di la snying po tsam zhig lus/ /rgyal po srin te snying po la/ /dga' ba med pas re ba bor/ /su zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ su zhig gnyer len tshul ngan po'i/ /mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa/ /des ni

bdag gi bu tsha dang / /bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas/ /gang zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ rdzing 'di nya dang rus sbal ni/ /mang po dag gis gang ba las/ /da ni sbal bas 'tsho mod kyi/ /bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro/ /

da ni zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la/ /bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i/ /long ba nyon mongs de dag ni/ /da ni mgon yang med par gyur/ /de rnams shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ de

rnams mtsho ni bzang po las/ /chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dag /bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur/ /bdag kyang da ltar der dga'o/ /'di dag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di dag khrus byas zos nas ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar

byed/ /bdag ni snyi yis bzung gyur pa/ /sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas/ /rmi lam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs pa dang / tsan dan dmar pos gtor ba dang / glad la me 'bar ba dang / mchan khung

gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba dang / rkang pa gnyis la nya khar ba gnyis ldag pa dang / ngang pa gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang / ri nag po zhig mdun na tshur 'ong ba dang / chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba mthong ngo / /de

gnyid sad nas 'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes byed nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam mo/ /des rmi lam de dag bram ze rmi lam gyi dpyad shes pa gang

dag yin pa de dag bos te bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis bsams pa/ lhas rmi lam de dag bzang po zhig mthong mod kyi 'on kyang bsngags par ni mi bya ste/ gal te bsngags na 'di ji lta ba ngan par gyur nas bram ze lhag ma gang dag yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par byed

par 'ong ngo snyam du rig nas gros byas te smras pa/ lha rmang lam ni mi bzang ba dag cig go/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'bras bu cir 'gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ gzhi de las lha rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos

smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis nga rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de lta 'ga' yod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha khyod kyis sdig chen po byas te bram ze brgyad khri bsad pas de'i slad du gal te

spyod na thabs gcig cig mchis so/ /de bram ze bsad pa dran nas snying kun tu 'dar te smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci bya smros shig /de dag gis smras pa/ lha bskyed mos tshal du rdzing bu rkor stsal te/ brkos nas rdo thal gyi nyug tu stsol cig /

de nas der yan lag gi mchog lnga po gsos pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang / skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang / gzhon nu ba lang skyong rnams bsad de bcug la de rnams kyi khrag gis khrus mdzad de rdzing bu nas byung la pus

mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas bram ze rnams kyi rkang pa la lces ldags nas/ de lta na khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing / srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis yan lag gi

mchog gsos pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang / skya seng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang / gzhon nu ba lang skyong rnams bsad na bdag rgyal po byas te yang ci rung snyam du bsams nas bram ze rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed

kyis gang smras pa de ngas thos kyis deng shig dang re shig bsams te bya'o/ /bram ze rnams dong ba dang de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas mthong ste des smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag 'gram pa la

gtad de sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad de la snyad pa dang / des smras pa/ lha bram ze de dag ni rtag tu mi rigs pa bsten pa lags pas de dag ci 'tshal/ bzhud la 'phags pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po la zhus shig /des

smras pa/ zhi ba legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis dus su 'phags pa kA t+yI bu chen po la gtad pas 'gro'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu ga la ba der song ngo / /der song ste song nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs

gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /slob dpon kA t+yI bu chen po 'di na bdag mtshan mo mal chen po zhig na nyal zhing mchis pa'i tshe rmi lam du sa bla'i

sgra drug dang / bar snang gi sgra drug ni thos/ rmi lam brgyad ni mthong ste/ sa bla'i sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drug /med/ bdag /ngan/ sems/ bdag cag /'di rnams shes bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni 'dir tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po

lags so/ /de la drug ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ lo ni stong phrag drug bcu dang / /lo ni brgya phrag drug bcu ru/ /sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi/ /nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ /med ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa

ni/ mtha' med mtha' lta ga la yod/ /nga dang khyed cag nyid kyis ni/ /mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar sdig pa'i las byas so/ /bdag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag /'thun dang mi 'thun pas

bsgrubs pa/ /gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur/ /ngan zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di na bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan/ /bdag cag gang bdog de ma btang / /longs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid la ni phan ma

byas/ /sems shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ sems kyis su ni bslus gyur cing / /mi shes pas ni bdas gyur pa/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi/ /gnya' ni su zhig byed par 'gyur/ /bdag cag 'di rnams shes bya ba las

tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru/ /song ste dge ba mang byas nas/ /de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing / /shis pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dong / /bar snang gi sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad/ su/ gang / da ni/ de rnams/ 'di dag

ces bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po lags so/ /de la thams cad ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ thams cad gsog tu phyung zin te/ /de la snying po tsam zhig lus/ /rgyal po srin te snying po la/ /dga' ba med pas re ba

bor/ /su zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ su zhig gnyer len tshul ngan po'i/ /mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa/ /des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang / /bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas/ /gang zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ rdzing 'di nya dang ru

sbal ni/ /mang po dag gis gang ba las/ /da ni sbal bas 'tsho mod kyi/ /bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro/ /da ni zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la/ /bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i/ /long ba nyon mongs de dag ni/ /da ni mgon yang

med par 'gyur/ /de rnams shes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las/ /chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dag /bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur/ /bdag kyang da ltar der dga'o/ /'di dag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di dag

khrus byas zos nas ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /bdag ni snyi yis bzung gyur pa/ /sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas/ /rmi lam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs pa dang / tsan dan dmar pos gtor ba dang /

glad la me 'bar ba dang / mchan khung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba dang / rkang pa gnyis la nya khar ba gnyis ldag pa dang / ngang pa gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang / ri nag po zhig mdun nas tshur 'ong ba dang / chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba

mthong ste/ gnyid sad nas 'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes bgyid nas/ gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam bgyid do/ /'phags pa kA t+yI bu chen po la bdag don 'di zhu na/ gzhi

'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur ba lags grang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sgra de dag dang / rmi lam de dag gzhan 'ga' zhig la bsnyad dam/ des smras pa/ 'phags

pa bsnyad do/ /su zhig la/ bram ze rnams la'o/ /de dag gis khyod la ji skad du lung bstan/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de dag ni rtag tu 'dod pa la longs spyod pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten mngon par 'dod pa yin te/

de dag ci shes/ khyod kyis sgra bzang po dag cig kyang thos/ rmi lam bzang po dag cig kyang mthong gis/ khyod ma 'jigs shig dang / gzhi de las khyod rgyal srid las nyams par yang mi 'gyur/ srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rmi lam na sa bla'i sgra drug thos pa gang yin pa de gang gi ltas yin zhe na/ khyod kyi mdun rol gyi rgyal po drug cig gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug pas lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes

so// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po nyi shu dgu pa/ de na gcig gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen nas tshigs su bcad pa/ lo ni stong phrag drug bcu dang / /lo ni brgya phrag drug bcu ru/ /sems can dmyal

bar 'tshed rnams kyi/ /nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba smras so/ /gnyis pas tshigs su bcad pa/ mtha' med mtha' lta ga la yod/ /nga dang khyed cag gnyis kyis ni/ /mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar

sdig pa'i las byas so/ /zhes bya ba smras so/ /gsum pas tshigs su bcad pa/ bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag /'thun dang mi 'thun pas bsgrubs pa/ /gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur/ /ces bya ba

smras so/ /bzhi pas tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di na bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan/ /bdag cag gang bdog de ma btang / /longs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid la ni phan ma byas/ /zhes bya ba smras so/ /lnga pas tshigs su bcad pa/ sems kyis su ni

bslus gyur cing / /mi shes pas ni bdas gyur pa/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi/ /gnya' ni su zhig byed par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba smras so/ /drug pas tshigs su bcad pa/ bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru/ /song ste dge ba mang byas nas/ /

de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing / /shis pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dong / /zhes bya ba smras te/ de dag ni de'i ltas yin no/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bar snang las sgra drug thos pa gang yin pa de gang gi ltas yin zhe na/ khyod kyi khyim gyi gdung ma de la

srin bu zhig gnas pa des de'i snying po ma yin pa thams cad zos nas snying po nyi tshe lus pa dang / de der mngon par mi dga' nas tshigs su bcad pa/ thams cad gsog tu phyung zin te/ /'di la snying po tsam zhig lus/ /rgyal po srin de snying po la/ /dga'

ba med pas re ba bor/ /zhes smras so/ /nam mkha'i sgra dang po ni de yin te/ de bas na khyod kyis phyung la gdung gzhan zhig chug shig /rgyal po chen po gzhan yang khyod kyi rta rdzi gnyer len zhes bya ba des bya rog mo'i sgo nga byung zhing byung ba rnams

bcom pa dang / de bu dang bral bas yid mi bde ba skyes te/ snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing dal bus tshigs su bcad pa/ su zhig gnyer len tshul ngan po'i/ /mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa/ /des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang / /bdag kyang sdug bsngal

las thar byas/ /shes bya ba smras te/ nam mkha'i sgra gnyis pa ni de yin gyis/ khyod kyis de 'joms su ma gzhug shig /gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na rtse ba'i rdzing bu bya rog gis btung slebs tsam du chus kha da chad du gang ba nya dang / ru

sbal dang / sbal ba mang po gnas pa de na chu skyar gcig cig nya dag za zhing 'dug pa las deng skams te chu med par gyur pa dang / chu skyar des de lta bu de mthong nas mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzing 'di nya dang rus sbal ni/ /mang po dag gis gang ba las/ /

da ni sbal bas 'tsho mod kyi/ /bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro/ /zhes bya ba smras te/ nam mkha'i sgra gsum pa ni de yin gyis khyod kyis de chus khong shig /gzhan yang khyod kyi yul na ri bo gtum ldan zhes bya ba de la glang po che dang glang po che mo dmus long

zhig gnas te/ de gnyis la bu gcig yod pa de de dag gi rim gro byed do/ /de de gnyis kyi zas kyi phyir song ba na glang po che mo zhig dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa las/ de khyod kyis thabs kyis brongs te khrid de 'ongs nas btags te bzhag pa dang / de ma dang pha'i

rjes su mya ngan byed cing rtswa yang mi za chu yang mi 'thung bar de dag rjes su dran zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas tshigs su bcad pa/ gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la/ /bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i/ /long ba nyon mongs de dag ni/ /da ni mgon yang med par gyur/ /

ces bya ba smras te/ nam mkha'i sgra bzhi pa ni de yin gyis/ pha ma'i grogs byed pa shi na mi rung bas khyod kyis de thong shig /gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ri dgas shig bzung ste 'dug pa de khyu dang bral bas dgon pa'i ri dgas rnams dran nas tshigs su bcad pa/

de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las/ /chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dang / /bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur/ /bdag kyang da ltar der dga'o/ /zhes bya ba smras te/ bar snang gi sgra lnga pa ni de yin gyis khyod kyis de thong shig /gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ngang pa dag cig bzung ste

'dug pa de dag gis ngang pa gnam la 'phur ba dag mthong nas mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di dag khrus byas zos nas ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /bdag ni snyi yis bzung gyur pa/ /sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas/ /zhes bya ba smras te/ nam

mkha'i sgra drug pa ni de yin pas de dag kyang khyod kyis gtang bar bya ste de ni de dag gi ltas yin no/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rmyi lam brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ci'i snga ltas yin zhe na/ re shig tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs par mthong ba gang yin pa ni

khyod la lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos gos be'u ras yug po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste de zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam dang po ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ /khyod kyis lus la tsan dan dmar pos

gtor bar mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos la ba rin po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/ de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas rmi lam gnyis pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ /khyod kyis glad pa la me 'bar

bar mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la yul ya ba na'i rgyal pos gser gyi phreng ba zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/ de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas rmi lam gsum pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ /khyod kyis mchan khung gnyis nas

sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la rgya'i rgyal pos ral gri zung cig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/ de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam bzhi pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ /khyod kyis rkang pa gnyis la nya

khar ba gnyis ldag pa mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la sing ga la'i rgyal pos nor bu'i lham zung cig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam lnga pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ /khyod kyis ngang pa gnyis

nam mkha' la 'phur ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la b+ha~M ga la'i rgyal pos rta gnyis shig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bar khyod kyi rmi lam drug pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ /khyod kyis ri nag po zhig

mdun nas tshur 'ong ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la ka ling ka'i rgyal pos glang po che'i gtso bo zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam bdun pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/ /khyod kyis

chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni khyod dang ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba shes par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis bram ze rnams la yang ngan sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rab snang srog stor ba las

phyir rnyed pa bzhin du dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen pos bshad pa la rjes su yi rang nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te song ngo / /de rang gi

khyim du song nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen pos ji skad smras pa de thams cad bsgrubs te gdung ma yang gzhan zhig bcug /rta rdzi gnyer len yang de ltar byed du ma bcug /rdzing bu yang chus bkang / glang po che dang / ri dgas dang / ngang pa rnams kyang btang ngo / /zhag bdun na

de'i skyes ji skad bstan pa thams cad kyang phyin nas de nor rnyed pas yid bde ba skyes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen po la je sems mngon par dad par gyur te bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim na dpal dang dbang thang phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zad yod pa de thams cad ni

'phags pa kA t+yI bu chen po la brten nas byung ba yin no/ /de'i phyir re shig gos be'u ras yug po che 'di bskur la phyis rgyal srid bstabs par bya'o snyam du rig nas mi zhig la smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod tshur gos be'u ras yug po che 'di khyer la 'phags

pa kA t+yI bu chen po la phul cig ces byas pa dang / des gos be'u ras yug po che de khyer nas 'phags pa kA t+yI bu chen po la byin no/ /de nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang / skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang / gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang / gsos pa dang / mdun na

'don la smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga la yul sna tshogs la dbang ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis skyes 'di dag bskur gyis khyed gang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin khyer cig /de nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas ni gser gyi phreng ba khyer/ skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas ni

la ba rin po che/ gzhon nu ba lang skyong gis ni rta gnyis/ gsos pas ni ral gri zung cig /mdun na 'don gyis ni nor bu'i lham zung cig khyer te glang po che'i gtso bo lus pa de rgyal pos khyer ro/ /de nas rgyal po rab snang yan lag gi mchog lnga la rin po che

dag gi bgo bsha' byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu

chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa sman 'dogs shing gces spras mdzad pa lags te/ de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa la rgyal srid stobs na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rgyal srid bzhes su gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu

chen pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das gyis dge slong la rgyal srid byed pa bkag go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de ltar na 'dod pa thams cad stobs na/ 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spyad du gsol/ des smras pa/

rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa thams cad kyang bkag go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na longs spyod dang / longs spyod kyi mchog rnams stobs na yongs su spyad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po re shig bcom

ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa de ltar mdzod cig de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das ni mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / mi rig pa dang / rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong kA t+yA'i bu chen po longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi 'on

kyang skye bo phyi ma rnams la phan gdags so snyam du dgongs nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog spur rnams

kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/ /gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na/ byol song gi

skye gnas su song ba rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen po'i thugs dang sems su 'phrod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu

chen pos lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba mngon par bsgrubs nas phan tshun lta ba dang nyan par yang zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi ched du longs spyod dang longs

spyod kyi mchog dag blang du rung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kA t+yI bu chen po skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir rung ste/ de lta bas na dge 'dun la longs spyod dang

longs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang gi gang zag la ni ma yin no/ /de la longs spyod ni 'di dag yin te/ grong dang / zhing rnams so/ /longs spyod kyi mchog ni ba lang dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug rnams so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das

la zhus nas rgyal po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dge 'dun la longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams

gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yI bu chen po las brten nas yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog

rnams kyang phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar 'dod pa thams cad stobs pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/ 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal

po rab snang 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag nga'i dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar bshos 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag nga'i dge

bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar gnas mal 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/ mnyan yod kyi khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di yin no/ /dge slong dag nga'i dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar gtsug

lag khang byed pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/ yul bA rA Na sI'i khyim bdag bzang ldan 'di yin no/ /bar sdom ni/ 'dod pa kun gyi rab snang ste/ /dge 'dun bshos kyi bzo sbyangs yin/ /gnas mal mgon med zas sbyin te/ /

gtsug lag khang gi bzang ldan no/ /rgyal po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor du res kyis zan za ste/ nyi ma gcig ni ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i drung du/ gcig ni skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma'i drung du'o/ /de dus gzhan zhig na dgongs pa/ ba

lang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i thad du zan za ba na rgyal po de zho la dga' bas ba lang skyong gi ma zho'i phor ba thogs te de zan za ba'i mdun na 'dug go/ /ji tsam na phyogs der skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma song ste/ des la ba rin po che bgos pa dang /

des glog byung ba lta bur rgyal po de ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang bcas te snang bar byas so/ /zhi bas snang ba de mthong nas ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/ lha 'di ci lags/ glog cig glo bur du byung ngam/ 'ga' zhig gis zhugs mar 'tshal/ des

smras pa/ zhi ba 'di ni glog gi 'od kyang ma yin/ mar me'i yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma phyogs 'di nas song ste/ des la ba rin po che bgos pas 'di ni de'i 'od yin no/ /khyod kyis la ba rin po che de lta bu btang ste gser gyi

phreng ba blangs pa ni khyod blun no/ /ji bdag gi khyim na gser gyi phreng ba med dam/ nyis na rigs ngan pa las skyes pa de the gi'o/ /des smras pa/ lha de la de lta bu'i shes rab ga la mchis/ gdon ma 'tshal bar khyod nyid kyis la ba rin po che long

shig ces bstan te des na des blangs lags mod/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas de la ma smras te des rang gi blos blangs so/ /khyod kyis smras so/ /ngas ma smras so zhes de gnyis 'thabs par gyur nas/ zhi bas de'i mgor zho'i phor bas bsnun pa

dang / rgyal po de spyi gcer zhig pas de'i glad pa zhom mo/ /des lag pas mnams te bsams pa/ bdag gi glad pa yang zhom/ bdag gi glad rgyas kyang lug pas 'dis ye bdag bsad kyis ji srid srog dang ma bral gyi bar du je 'di bsad do snyam

nas/ des gsos pa la bsgo ba/ gsos pa ngas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongs su btang gis sod cig /gsos pas bsams pa/ de 'di la shin du 'phangs na 'di khros pa'i kun nas dkris pas 'di skad du zer bar zad pas 'phral la gsad

par mi bya'i kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas bsam pa shes par bya ste gsad kyis re shig gnas dben pa zhig tu gzhag go snyam du rig nas/ smras pa/ lha de ltar 'tshal te dgum mo zhes byas nas/ des de gnas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go/ /rgyal pos

kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/ gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba ga re/ des smras pa/ lha khyod kyis ngas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongs su btang gis gsod cig ces bka' stsal pas bdag gis de lha'i bka' bzhin du bkum lags so/ /

des smras pa/ gsos pa legs so/ /da ni nga dang / skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang / gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang / mdun na 'don kyang song la khyod nyid cod pan chings te rgyal srid byed la rag go/ /ngas ko des nga la ma gus pa byas pas ngas de nan thur byas la

phyis dga' bar bya'o snyam du bsam bsam na khyod kyis mod kho na la bsad pa lta zhig /des smras pa/ lha 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig smras pa'i don dpes kyang kun 'tshal bar 'gyur bas re shig dpe gsan du gsol/ bsdus pa'i

sdom ni/ khra bo dang ni sgren mo dang / /rnyed par dka' dang slu ba dang / /mi ngoms pa dang gnyid gtogs par/ /bsdus pa'i sdom du yang dag bsdus/ /sdom ni/ khra bo spre'u dang 'jig rten na/ /long ba dag ste tha ma yin/ /rgyal po chen po

sngon byung ba ri'i phyogs mi 'du ba dang 'jigs pa ma mchis pa shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyan pa/ seng ge dang / stag dang / dred dang / byi la dang / ri dgas dang / phag rgod rgyu ba/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis bsten pa gcig cig tu srog

chags thi bas shing chen po zhig gi khar tshang bcas te/ des de 'bras bu smin pa rnams kyis bkang nas chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo khyod kyis 'bras bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya ste/ da lta ni gang yang rung bas bdag nyid 'tsho bar bya'o/ /nam rlung dang /

yul ngan byung ba de'i tshe 'di dag bza' bar bya'o/ /des smras pa/ legs te de bzhin bya'o/ /ji tsam na rlung dang nyi mas phog pas 'bras bu rnams skams te tshang de 'gribs par gyur pa dang / thi bas smras pa/ bzang mo ngas khyod la khyod kyis 'bras bu 'di dag

bza' bar mi bya ste/ rlung ngam yul ngan byung ba'i tshe bza' bar bya'o zhes ma bkag gam/ 'o na ci'i phyir khyod kyis zos/ des smras pa/ bdag gis ma zos so/ /des smras pa/ ngas tshang 'di bkang ste bzhag na/ gal te khyod kyis ma zos na 'o na tshang

'di ci'i phyir 'gribs par gyur/ des smras pa/ tshang 'di ci'i phyir 'gribs ma shes/ bdag gis ni 'di las 'bras bu cig kyang ma zos so/ /khyod kyis zos so ngas ma zos so zhes de gnyis lan dang yang lan 'debs pa na thab mo byung ste des thi ba mo de

mchus bsnun nas srog dang bral te de de nyid na 'phyang zhing 'dug go/ /re shig cig na dus ma yin pa'i char chen po bab pa dang / yang tshang de de kho na bzhin du 'bras bu de dag gis gang nas des bsams pa/ tshang 'di 'bras bu dag gis yang gang ba las na des 'di dag

ma zos so snyam nas/ des de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa/ khra mo sdug pa longs shig /'di dag khyod kyis ma zos te bdag gi tshang 'di gang gis nyes pa cig bzod par mdzod cig ces byas pa dang / lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nags tshal rgyu ba'i thi

ba ni/ /'dab ma khra bo mig dmar ba/ /rang gis sdug ma bsad nas ni/ /blo ngan ci zhig mya ngan byed/ /ji ltar thi ba bab col spyod pa yis/ /'di na sdug pa nyes med bsad nas ni/ /blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes/ /de la bzhams te nyes cig bzod

gsol ba/ /de bzhin rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa yis/ /zhi ba yid dang 'thad pa 'dir bsad nas/ /blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes/ /de la bzhams te nyes cig bzod pa gsol zhes bgyi ba lags te/ lha khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don ni bdag dpe de

dang 'dra ba snyam bgyid do/ /lha gzhan yang khyim bdag cig dbyar 'das pa dang ston gyi dus su sran ma'i khur 'tshal nas zhing thog tu chas so/ /des sran ma'i khur de shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas pha zad du bshang ba'i sar mchis pa dang / ji tsam na spre'u zhig shing

de las babs nas sran ma las spar gang blangs te yang shing de las 'dzegs so/ /de 'dzeg pa na sran ma 'brum bu cig shor de sa la lhung nas des sran ma spar gang po de bor te/ sran ma 'brum bu cig po de btsal bar brtsams pa na/ khyim bdag des de la bong ba cig

bsnun te de dus las 'das pa dang lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sran ma spar gang bor nas su/ /gang zhig 'bras bu gcig tshol ba/ /shin tu tshogs mang ldan pa yi/ /spre'u 'di kye ma re mi mdzangs/ /shes bgyi ba lags te lhas gsungs pa'i don gang zhig ba

lang skyong gi ma bkum nas/ yang bzod pa gsol bar bzhed pa ni bdag dpe de dang 'dra ba snyam bgyid do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis tshig cig kho na'i kha la ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/ /des smras pa/ lha ston pa gang zag zla med pa/ /

gcig pu tshig ni gcig gsung ste/ /gsung ba de ni nges lags pas/ /'di la bdag blo 'gyur ma mchis/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga long bar byas so/ /

des smras pa/ lha/ lha dang mir bcas 'jig rten 'dir/ /long ba gnyis ni nges grub pa/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dmus long dang / /gang yang chos la mi gnas pa'o/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /gzhan yang long ba gnyis lags te/ /gang la sdig lta

de yod dam/ /gang zhig khrims la mi brten pa'o/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ sdom ni/ sgren mo cir yang mi rung dang / /ma spyad gtun dang lan gcig dang / /nad dang bag tsha brnyas pa dang / /de bzhin du ni bags kyis so/ /byis pa dang ni bshes dag

dang / /skyes bu tha shal nyid dang ni/ /shing rta yis ni 'khor lo dang / /g.yo gtogs par ni yongs su rdzogs/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga sgren mor byas so/ /des smras pa/ lha sgren mo gsum

gyi mi mdzes pa khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gsum gang yin/ lha/ klung ni chu med sgren mo ste/ /yul 'khor 'dren med sgren mo'o/ /gal te ming po bcu yod kyang / /khyo med bud med sgren mo'o/ /zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/

gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga cir yang mi rung bar byas so/ /des smras pa/ lha 'jig rten na cir yang mi rung ba gsum mchis par khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ des smras pa/ gsos pa gsum gang yin/ lha/ rta bo thal kar bang bul dang / /

ston mo bya na med pa dang / /bud med gang zhig khyim sun 'byin/ /'di gsum cir yang mi rung ba'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba longs ma spyad par khyod kyis bsad do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ sol ba byed pa'i gos dang ni/ /bkru bshal

byed pa'i lham dag dang / /rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ni/ /longs ma spyad par dengs par 'gyur/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ lha de dag 'ba' shig tu ma bas gzhan yang gsum ste/ nags kyi shing gi me tog dang / /dka' thub can gyi lang

tsho dang / /shing rta mkhan gyi chung ma dag /longs ma spyad par dengs par 'gyur/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni gtun gyis brdeg pa'i rgyu'o/ /des smras pa/ lha/ shing mkhan rtsang rtsing 'jog pa dang / /

bzang mkhan skud pa ring po dang / /kha lo sgyur ba mig rgyang thung / /de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu'o/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ lha de dag 'ba' shig tu ma bas/ gzhan yang gsum ste/ pho nya'i pho nya gang yin dang / /mngag gzhug pa yi mngag gzhug dang / /

bud med 'phyon ma byed pa gang / /de gsum btun gyis brdeg rgyu'o/ /lha de dag 'ba' shig tu ma bas gzhan yang gsum ste/ gnag rdzi grong na rgyu ba dang / /'dreg mkhan nags na rgyu ba dang / /mag pa rtag tu 'ong byed pa/ /de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu'o/ /

rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba lan gcig gis bsad do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po smra ba lan gcig ste/ /bu mo sbyin pa lan gcig go/ /'phags pa'i gzigs pa lan gcig ste/ /de gsum lan re lan re 'o/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis

ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni rang gis nad bslangs so/ /des smras pa lha sdar ma sna tshogs go gyon dang / /rtswa mjing chung ngu nor mang dang / /rgan po chung ma gzhon len pa/ /de dag rang gis nad

bslangs so/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga ni khyod la bag tsha'o/ /des smras pa/ lha/ dka' thub can ni blun mthong dang / /dpa' bo rma mtshan med pa dang / /bu mo chen mo mthong nas

ni/ /snying la bag tsha skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga brnyas so/ /des smras pa/ lha/ cal le col le smra ba dang / /gnyis pa gos ngan gyon pa dang / /rku

zhing za ba gang yin pa/ /de gsum brnyas par bya ba yin/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas ngas khyod dgra zhig bags kyis spel to/ /des smras pa/ lha/ nya ni bags kyis

bza' bar bya/ /ri bo la ni bags kyis gzeg /don rnams bags kyis bsgrub bya ste/ /'di gsum bags kyis bags kyis bya/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas

khyod ni byis pa'o/ /des smras pa/ lha/ ma 'dris pa la yid rton dang / /ma rungs pa la sten pa dang / /gya tsom du ni yongs gtong ba/ /byis pa'i mtshan nyid rnam gsum mo/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis

ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni bshes pa 'byed pa yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ bshes rnams la ni mi sten dang / /gnyis pa ha cang sten pa dang / /dus ma yin par slong byed pa/ /des ni bshes rnams 'byed par byed/ /ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan

tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni skyes bu tha shal yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ rtag tu gzhan gyi nor dang ni/ /bdag nyid 'dod pa rnog byed dang / /de bzhin sdug bsngal la dga' ba/ /de gsum skyes bu

tha shal yin/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni shing rta'i 'khor los gsad rgyu yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ ri mo mkhan ni tshon gtong mi shes dang / /'khrul 'khor mkhan

ni 'byor ka mi shes dang / /gyad gyi bu ni dor thabs mi shes pa/ /gsad bya gsad par rtag tu bzlog pa med/ /ces bgyi ba lhas ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni g.yo can yin no/ /des

smras pa/ lha/ bud med khyo gsum brgyud pa dang / /dge slong phyir ni 'ongs pa dang / /bya ni rgya las shor dang gsum/ /g.yo can nang na de g.yo ngan/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ sdom ni/ rnyed par dka' dang gzhan dang gcig /bsags dang

de bzhin mi mthun dang / /brdungs dang med pa nyid dang ni/ /mi 'tsham pa ni don med do/ /gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma rnyed dka' ba bsad do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ ri bong rwa can rnyed par dka'/ /ru sbal spu can rnyed par dka'/ /smad 'tshong gcig pu 'dug

pa dang / /gzu bo drang por smra rnyed dka'/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis gzhan gyi ched du ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ gtams pa len dang gnya' bo dang / /g.yon can gyi ni che bzhi dang / /smyan byed blo

zhan bzhi po dag /gzhan gyi don du ma rung 'gyur/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga gcig pur byas so/ /des smras pa/ lha/ skye ba na yang 'di gcig skye bar 'gyur/ /

de bzhin 'chi ba na yang 'di gcig 'chi/ /skye bo gcig pus 'di na sdug bsngal myong / /'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba tshogs bsags pa bsad

do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ nya sgong a mra'i me tog dang / /sdug bsngal gyur pa'i don gnyer ba/ /dper na ston ka'i sprin bzhin du/ /bsags pa rnams kyang don med 'gyur/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod

kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni mi mthun pa yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ nyi ma grib mar mi mthun zhing / /snang ba dang ni mun pa dang / /nyin par mtshan mor mi mthun te/ /chos dang chos min rtag mi 'thun/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos

smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni brdung rgyu'o/ /des smras pa/ lha/ gos rnams brdungs na 'jam po dag tu 'gyur/ /bong bu brdungs na de dag mgyogs par 'gyur/ /bud med rnams ni brdungs na dbang du 'gyur/ /

rnga dag ma brdungs sgra 'byin mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni med par bya ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ rlung gis sbun pa med par byed/ /skye bo'i sgra yis

glu de bzhin/ /skyes bu ngan pa bsten pa dang / /mi mdzes yon tan med par byed/ /ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po brdzun

du smra ba dang / /sman pa gsung dang dge sbyong 'khrug /blo dang ldan pa kun mongs pa/ /bzhi ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis don med par ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ nyin par

mar me bus pa don med do/ /rgya mtshor char pa bab pa don med do/ /'drangs la ston mo byin pa don med do/ /skyes bu ngan pa bsten pa don med do/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ sdom ni/ slu dang blta dang ma legs dang / /bskrad dang 'jigs dang mi dga' gtang / /

sred dang ma bsams mya ngan gtogs/ /de ni tshogs su yang dag bsgrags/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni slu ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ slu ba bzhi mchis par khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ bzhi gang

yin/ lha/ mi 'dod pa la 'doms pa dang / /gnyid kyis dub la 'chad pa dang / /don du gnyer min don gnyer dang / /stobs dang ldan rnams 'gyed pa'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni blta bar bya ba yin no/ /

des smras pa/ lha/ g.yul ngor dpa' bo blta bya ste/ /mi bzad dug la gsang sngags blta/ /bza' btung tshe na nye du ste/ /don rtogs bya la mkhas pa blta/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba

bsad pas ma legs pa byas so/ /des smras pa/ lha/ khyim pa le lo ma legs chags ma legs/ /rab byung yang dag sdom pa min ma legs/ /rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa'ang ma legs te/ /mkhas gang 'khrug byed de yang ma legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod

kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni bskrad par bya ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ mi mkhas shing rta gcog pa dang / /khal chen 'gel bas glang gsod dang / /ha cang bzhos pas be'u gsod dang / /

nye du'i khyim 'dug chung ma bskrad/ /ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod mthong na nga 'jigs so/ /des smras pa/ lha/ 'ur pa dang ni chu skyar dang / /gsum pa phyag dar srin bu dang / /bzhi

pa lham bu chu gsher ni/ /'jigs bya min la 'jigs par byed/ /ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba med pas mi dga'o/ /des smras pa/ lha/ spre'u ni grong na mi dga' ste/ /chu srin byis pa gsod ri la/ /chom rkun

dge sbyong khyim du ste/ /byi po rang gi khyim mi dga'/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni gtang bar bya ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ rigs kyi phyir ni gcig gtang ste/ /

grong gi phyir ni rigs gtang ngo / /yul gyi phyir ni grong gtang ste/ /bdag gi phyir ni yul gtang ngo / /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga'i sred pa 'chad du mi btub po/ /des smras pa/

lha/ rtsa med gzhan gyi bud med dang / /lag pa gcig gis chu 'thung dang / /gzhan gyis chang blud gang yin pa/ /de dag sred pa 'chad pa med/ /ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ma bsams pa kho nar ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/ /des

smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po rgyal po'i mdzod ni ma bsams par/ /lam du zhugs la chom por ma bsams par/ /khyim na bud med thab mo ma bsams par/ /rab tu byung ba'i rnyed pa ma bsams par/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/

gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas mya ngan bya ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ chags can rgas pa'ang mya ngan bya ba ste/ /mi bzang por mo 'ang mya ngan bya ba yin/ /smad 'tshong rgas pa 'ang mya ngan bya ba ste/ /rab byung gtum po'ang

mya ngan bya ba yin/ /sdom ni/ blta bas mi ngoms yid 'thad dang / /brtse bar mi bya nor dang ni/ /smra bar mi bya rab sdang dang / /mgon med bshes dang yid brtan pa'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis nga'i ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba blta bas mi

ngoms pa bsad do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ glang po'i gtso dang rgyal po dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang / /sangs rgyas smra ba rnams kyi mchog /blta ba yis ni mi ngoms yin/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis

ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba nga'i yid dang 'thad pa bsad do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ gzugs bzang mo dang rigs ldan dang / /des dang rigs ni 'phel byed pa/ /dar la bab dang bud med lnga/ /rgyal chen yid dang 'thad pa yin/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/

rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod dang lhan cig rtse bar mi bya ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ byis pa sbrul dang sbal ba dang / /gang gi ma ni g.yem pa dang / /mi gang mdza' ni mi rtag dang / /lhan

cig rtse bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod kyis nor 'phrog pa byas so/ /des smras pa/ lha/ rol mo mkhan dang dmag mi dang / /sman pa

chom rkun btson rdzi ste/ /de dag nyam thag gyur pa la'ang / /nor ni 'phrog par byed pa yin/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni smra bar bya ba ma yin

no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ ha cang phyug dang ha cang dbul/ /dma' dang ha cang mtho gang dang / /ha cang ring dang ha cang nye/ /de drug smra bar bya ba min/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong

gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni sems rab tu sdang ba yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ sbyin pa mi snang mi mthun byed pa dang / /mthun par mi byed nyes spyod sgrogs pa dang / /sbyin pa byin nas rim gyis ldog byed pa/ /de dag rab tu sdang ba'i rtags yin no/ /

zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga mgon med par gyur to/ /des smras pa/ lha/ gnas brtan rgyal po rgan po dang / /tshul med bka'

blo mi bde dang / /bla ma la ni gnod byed gang / /de drug mgon ni med par bshad/ /ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod dang lhan cig bshes par bya

ba ma yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ bzhad rgad mkhan dang gar mkhan dang / /pho nya smad 'tshong chang dad can/ /ma ning de bzhin gzhung ngan pa/ /de dag dang ni bshes mi bya/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod

kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni yid brtan par bya ba ma yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ ske tsam nub pa'i chu dang rta dang ni/ /glang po che dang spre'u dang sbrul nag dang / /spu 'greng ba dang gdong gnyer gang ba dang / /kha spu nyung la yid ni brtan mi bya/ /zhes

bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ sdom ni/ gnyid med 'dod pa ma yin dang / /kun nas mnar sems dngos po dang / /de bzhin snying rje khwa dang ni/ /zlog thab tha ma stobs yin no/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi

ba bsad pas nga gnyid med do/ /des smras pa/ lha/ g.yem dang skem nad can dang ni/ /cham pas thebs dang sdug bsngal dang / /don sems khros dang brtson pa dang / /'jigs pa de ni rnam kun tu/ /gnyid mi 'ong ste 'jig rten na/ /brgyad ni rang bzhin sdug

bsngal lo/ /zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga 'dod pa ma yin no/ /des smras pa/ lha/ 'dod pa ma yin pa'i dngos po brgyad ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan

tam/ gsos pa brgyad gang yin/ na dang rga dang 'chi ba dang / /sdug bral mi sdug phrad pa dang / /ser ba thog tog mi rtag nyid/ /brgyad ni 'jig rten 'dod min rab/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas

nga khyod la kun nas mnar sems skyes so/ /des smras pa/ lha/ kun nas mnar sems dgu 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/ gsos pa dgu gang yin/ lha 'di ni bdag la gnod par 'dod pa phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa bde ba ma yin

par 'dod pa reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa ste/ 'dis bdag la 'dod pa byas so byed do byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung bas bdag gi 'di

kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par ga la 'gyur snyam nas/ de de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar byed do/ /'di ni gang zhig bdag la gnod par 'dod pa phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/ rig pa ma

yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/ de la gnod par 'dod pa/ phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/ reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa ste/ 'dis de la gnod pa byas so byed do

byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung bas bdag gis 'di kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par ga la 'gyur snyam nas/ de de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel
