gnas brtan kun dga' bo yang grur zhugs nas chu bo gang gA'i dbus su 'dug go/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa lta bur kha bye sangs rgyas yangs

pa'i spyan/ /srid pa gsum gyi sgron mar gyur pa zhi bar gshegs gyur pas/ /bdag cag khyod la skyabs 'ongs gal te zhi bar gshegs gyur na/ /bdag cag don du tshur gshegs khyod kyi sku ni 'dir 'or cig /ji tsam na yangs pa can

pa dag gis kyang de skad smras pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang 'di ltar bsam pa bskyed de/ gal te ma ga d+ha yi grong du bdag gi lus bor na/ /lid tsa bi rnams gdon mi za bar sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /gal te grong khyer spong byed dag tu bdag

gi lus bor na/ /ma ga d+ha yi bdag po nges par mi dga' bas/ /de bas lus phyed mi yi dbang po la/ /lus kyi phyed ni tshogs la byin byas nas/ /'di ltar de dag gnyi gas yang dag par/ /rtag pa kho nar mchod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /ji tsam na

gnas brtan kun dga' bo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de'i tshe drang srong gzhan zhig 'khor lnga brgyas bskor nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs te thal

mo sbyar nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la bdag cag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong gi dngos po gsol lo zhes smras pa dang / ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bos slob ma

rnams lhan cig tu bdag gi drung du tshur shog ces bsam pa bskyed nas des bsam pa de bskyed ma thag tu de bzhin du slob ma lnga brgya der 'ongs so/ /gnas brtan kun dga' bos chu'i dbus sa gzhir sprul nas lam med par byas so/ /

ji tsam na drang srong 'khor lnga brgya po rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol ba byas pa dang / 'khor lnga brgya pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /las gsum pa brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra

bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag chu bo gang gA'i dbus dang nyi ma'i gung la rab tu byung bas kha cig ni chu dbus/ kha cig ni nyi ma'i gung zhes bya bar kun tu grags te/ de dag gis bya ba byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'

bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rab bzang thams cad kyi tha mar rab tu phyung na dang por yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas mkhan pos bka' stsol cig dang bdag cag ni sngar yongs su mya

ngan las 'da' ste/ mkhan po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bar ni bdag cag mi 'tshal lo/ /gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bu bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su

mya ngan las 'das/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos kyang nga la gtad de/ da nga ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs su srungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis kha che'i yul ni bsam gtan dang 'thun pa dang

gnas mal gyi mchog go zhes 'di ltar kha che'i yul lung bstan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des 'dir

bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de bas na bu khyod kyis bstan pa la 'jug par byos shig /des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan par

brtsams pa/ ma ga d+ha pa snying rjes ngu zhing mgon po tshur gshegs shes/ /spong byed pa yang snying rjes ngu zhing mgon po tshur gshegs 'bod/ /chu 'gram dag na skye bo gnyis kyis tshig brjod pa/ /gsan nas blo gros can gyi sngon gyi

sku ni so sor byas/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lus byin gyis brlabs nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te me la chu gtor ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lus phyed ni yangs pa can pas/ lus phyed ni rgyal

po ma skyes dgras thob nas smras pa/ ye shes rdo rje rnon po yis/ /rang gi lus kyi ri bcom ste/ /phyed ni mi yi dbang po byin/ /phyed ni thub pas tshogs rnams byin/ /de nas li tsa bi rnams kyis yangs pa can du mchod rten brtsigs nas

bzhag go/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgras kyang grong khyer skya snar can gyi bur mchod rten brtsigs nas bzhag go/ /de nas nyi ma'i gung gi bsam pa skyes pa/ bdag gi mkhan pos kyang kha che yul du bstan pa zhog shig ces bsgo/ bcom ldan

'das kyis kyang dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des kha che'i yul du klu mi srun pa hu lu dun btul nas bstan pa 'jog par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas ma la bdag gis ston pa'i dgongs pa yongs su bsgrub par

bya'o/ /snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma'i gung gis kha che'i yul du song ste skyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'dug go/ /de nas nyi ma'i gung gis kha che yul gyis klu 'di zil gyis mnan la/ klu de dag 'khrugs par byas na 'dul bar 'gyur ro

snyam du bsams na de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'di ltar kha che'i yul rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ klu de dag kyang 'khrugs shing rab tu rngam nas rdzi char drag po dag phab ste gnas brtan la gnod pa bya bar chas

pa dang / gnas brtan gyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas klu de dag gis gnas brtan gyi chos gos gyi mtha' ma yang g.yo bar ma nus so/ /de nas klu dag gis mda'i char phab pa dang / gnas brtan gyis kun tu

gsal ba'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar por phab bo/ /klu dag gis rdo rje rtse gcig dang / mda' bo che dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / dgra sta dag 'phang bar brtsams pa dang / gnas brtan gyi steng du

me tog ku su ma'i char bab nas smras pa/ gangs ri rtse mo de ni nyi ma'i 'od kyis rab tu bzhu ba na/ /ri bo'i rtse mo de dag kun ni med par song gyur mthong ba ltar/ /phyag dar char phab ku su ma yi char pa sna tshogs bab par byas/ /gnam

las mda' yi char phab me tog phreng bar kun tu gnas par gyur/ /de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas lus la mes ma tshig /mtshon gyis ma tshugs/ dug gis ma tshugs te/ klu rnams ngo mtshar skyes so/ /de

nas klu de dag gnas brtan gyi drung du song ste 'phags pa bka' ci stsal ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ gnas 'di nga la byin cig /klu dag gis smras pa/ dbul bar rngo mi thog go/ /gnas brtan gyis gnas 'di ni

bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i gnas su lung bstan te/ gang kha che yul 'di bsam gtan dang 'thun pa'i gnas mal yin pas deng phan chad nga'i yin no zhes smras pa dang / klu rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal tam/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /klu rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas ci tsam zhig dbul bar bgyi/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ skyil mo dkrung bcas pa tsam mo/ /klu rnams kyis

btsun pa dbul bar bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang / gnas brtan gyis skyil mo dkrung bcas pas lung pa dgu'i mdo skyil mo dkrung gis non pa dang / klu rnams kyis gnas brtan 'khor ji snyed cig mnga' zhes smras pa dang / gnas brtan gyis dge

slong ji snyed cig 'du bar 'gyur snyam bsams pa dang / ji tsam na dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'o snyam du gnas brtan gyis bsams nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'o zhes smras pa dang / klu rnams kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /gal te dgra bcom pa gcig

gcig gis ma tshang na de'i tshe kha che yul bdag cag gis slar dbrog par bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang / gnas brtan nyi ma'i gung gis kha che yul gyi klu rnams la smras pa/ de yin mod kyi 'on kyang gang na sbyin bdag gnas pa de na len pa yod pas

ngas khyim bdag kyang 'jug par bya'o/ /klu rnams kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras pa dang / ji tsam na gnas brtan gyis skye bo rang nyid kyis grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dag byas te skye bo'i tshogs dag zhugs pa dang / de dag gis

gnas brtan ji ltar bdag cag 'phel bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang / ji tsam na gnas brtan gyis skye bo'i tshogs dag khrid nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang du phyin nas gur gum dag thon cig ces smras pa dang / ji tsam na ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi klu rnams

'khrugs pa dang / de dag kyang gnas brtan gyis btul nas de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ji srid cig gnas par 'gyur/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ lo stong ngo / /de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa

ji srid du gnas pa de srid du gnang bar bya'o zhes dam tshig byas pa dang / gnas brtan gyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas/ ji tsam na gnas brtan gyis kha che yul du gur gum gzhag par byin gyis brlabs so/ /ji tsam na gnas brtan nyi ma'i gung gis

bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa kha che yul du bzhag cing rgya cher byas nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sbyin pa po dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad pa'i yid dga' bar byas nas me la chus btab pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song nas

de'i lus tsan dan sa mchog dang a ga ru la sogs pa'i shing gis bsregs nas mchod rten brtsigs te bzhag go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha na'i gos can gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas rab tu phyung nas des bstan pa rgya cher byas te/ tshe dang

ldan pa nye sbas la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas shes par byos shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos

mkhan po la/ mkhan pos ni nga la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /bu nga yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ da ni khyod kyis bstan pa yongs su bskyang zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa

thams cad la khyod kyis nan tan byos shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha na'i gos can gyis sbyin pa po dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i yid dga' bar byas nas spar ba dang / bsreg pa dang / char dbab pa dang / glog 'byung ba'i

cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /gnas brtan nye sbas kyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa d+hi ti ka la/ tshe dang ldan pa d+hi ti kas bstan pa'i dgos pa byas

nas tshe dang ldan pa nag po la/ tshe dang ldan pa nag pos tshe dang ldan pa legs mthong la ste/ de ltar glang po chen po dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya

dang bcu lon te rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub pa dang / yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa'i gzhi bcu po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi

'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal ba phyung ste/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa la rung bar yongs su ston cing kun du spyod/ rab tu spyod de/ bcu gang zhe na/ yangs pa can gyi

dge slong rnams kyis a la la zhes bya ba ni rung bar byas nas mi 'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / 'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / mi 'thun pas chos kyi las byed de/ 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/

ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/ rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs pa

can gyi dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar byos shig ces nyen 'khor gyi dge slong rnams rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jug cing rjes su yi rang ba rung bar byas nas mi 'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang /

'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / mi 'thun pas chos kyi las byas te/ 'di ni gnyis pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag

la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa la rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/ rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rang gi lag gis sa rko zhing rkor 'jug par spyod pa rung bar byed pa ste/

'di ni gzhi gsum pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin

pa la rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/ rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshwa dus su rung ba dang lhan cig bsres nas kun tu spyod cing tshwa rung ba'o zhes byed pa

ste/ 'di ni gzhi bzhi pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa la

rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/ rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis dpag tshad dang dpag tshad phyed du song ste/ 'dus shing zas zos nas lam gyis rung bar byed de/ 'di ni gzhi lnga pa mdo sde las 'das/

'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa la rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/

rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis lhag mar ma byas pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sor mo gnyis byas te zos nas sor mo gnyis rung bar byed do/ /'di ni gzhi drug pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/

ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa la rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/ rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs

pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis srin bu pad pa bzhin du chang bzhibs te 'thungs nas nad pas rung bar byed de/ 'di ni gzhi bdun pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi

'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/ rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis

'o ma bre gang dang zho bre gang dkrugs nas dus ma yin par za zhing bsres pas rung bar byed de/ 'di ni gzhi brgyad pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la

mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar spyod cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis

'khor bas gding ba sar pa la ma klan par yongs su longs spyod par byed cing gding bas rung bar byed de/ 'di ni gzhi dgu pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos

nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/ rab tu spyod do/ /gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed gang dag zlum po dag pa spyad par 'os pa de dag

dris bskus nas bdug pa zhim pos bdug ste/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa dge sbyong gi mgo bo la khri'u stan dang chas pa'i steng du bzhag nas lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dag bskor nas 'di skad ces

bsgrags so/ /grong khyer dang yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po yangs pa can na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /lhung bzed 'di ni lhung bzed bzang po yin te/ 'dir byin zhing shin tu byin nam/ gang gis 'dir blugs pa byas

na de dag gis blugs pa byas pas 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / brtson pa che ba dang / rgya che bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang / der dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che gzhan de dag kyang snyed cing thob nas de la longs spyod cing gser dngul gyis rung

bar byed de/ 'di ni gzhi bcu pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis mi rung ba rung bar

yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod do/ /de nas de'i tshe yangs pa can na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig gnas pa gnas brtan thams cad 'dod pa zhes bya ba de dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa zhes bya ba snying las

chung bar gnas pa zhig 'dug go/ /grong khyer nor can na de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i gnas brtan grags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa zhig ste/ de 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer yangs pa can du 'ongs

so/ /ji tsam na rnyed pa dag 'god de der 'ongs pa dang / dge skos kyis gnas brtan dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'god kyis longs shig ces smras pa dang / des tshe dang ldan pa rnyed pa byung ba ci zhig sus byin zhes smras so/ /des rgyas par brjod pa dang / des chu bur 'di

gcig pu byung bar zad dam/ gzhan yang yod snyam brtags pa dang / ji tsam na bslab pa lhod cing rung ba ma yin pa'i dngos po bcu kun tu spyod pa 'phel bar mthong nas/ des bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa thams cad 'dod pa ga la ba

der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa thams cad 'dod pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa thams cad 'dod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gnas brtan a la la zhes rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes

rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang / 'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / mi 'thun pas chos kyi las byed de a la la zhes bya ba rung bar byed do// //

'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gnas brtan gang du bcas/ grong khyer tsam par ro/ /gang las brten te/ dge slong drug sde dag las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /

gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba

ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/ rab tu spyod na de dag khyod kyis btang snyoms gzhag gam zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des smras pa/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na/ 'di zhu bar bgyi ste

rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa 'di rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang / 'thun pas chos ma yin pa

dang / mi mthun pas chos kyi las byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar byos shig ces nyen kor gyi dge slong rnams rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jug cing rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin

no/ /gnas brtan gang du bcas/ grong khyer tsam par ro/ /gang las brten te/ dge slong drug sde dag las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi gnyis pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa

dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de dag khyod kyis btang

snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des smras pa/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste kun tu spyod pas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa kun du spyod pas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/

gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rang gi lag gis sa rko zhing brkos nas kun tu spyod pas rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ mnyan yod du'o/ /gang las brten/ dge slong drug sde

dag las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ ltung byed do/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi gsum pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de

dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des smras pa/ gnas brtan

de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ tshwa rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa tshwa rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar gyi tshwa rung ba dus su rung ba dang lhan cig bsres nas

yongs su spyod cing tshwa dus su rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ rgyal po'i khab tu'o/ /gang las brten/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ ltung byed do/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi bzhi pa

mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing

kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des smras pa/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste lam gyis rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan

pa lam gyis rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis dpag tshad dang / dpag tshad phyed du song ste/ 'dus shing zan zos nas lam gyis rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /

gang du bcas/ rgyal po'i khab tu'o/ /gang las brten/ lhas byin las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ ltung byed do/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi lnga pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /

'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi smra bar

'dug go/ /des smras pa/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ sor mo gnyis kyis rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa sor mo gnyis kyis rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams

kyis lhag mar ma byas pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sor mo gnyis kyis rung bar byas te zos nas sor mo gnyis rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ mnyan yod du'o/ /gang las brten/ dge slong mang po las so/ /

ltung ba cir 'gyur/ ltung byed do/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi drug pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te de dag la yangs pa can

gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin par rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des smras pa/ gnas brtan de ni der bas

na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ nad pas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa nad pas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis srin bu pad pa bzhin du chang bzhibs nas nad pas rung bar bgyid do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ mnyan yod du'o/ /gang las brten/ tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ ltung byed do/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi bdun pa zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/ /de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/

bsres pas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa bsres pas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis 'o ma bre gang dang zho bre gang dkrugs nas dus ma yin par za zhing dkrugs pas rung bar

bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ mnyan yod du'o/ /gang las brten/ dge slong mang po las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ ltung byed do/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi brgyad pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/

ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms

su gzhag gam zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des smras pa/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ gding bas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa gding bas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan 'di ltar

yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis 'khor ba gding ba sar pa la ma glan par longs spyod par byed cing gding bas rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ mnyan yod du'o/ /gang

las brten/ dge slong mang po las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ ltung byed do/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dgu pa mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de

dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /des smras pa/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu

bar bgyi ste/ gser dngul gyis rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ gser dngul gyis rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed gang dag zlum po dag pa spyad par 'os pa de dag dris bskus nas bdug pa

dri zhim pos bdugs te me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa dge sbyong gi mgo bo la khri'u stan dang chas pa'i steng du bzhag nas lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dag bskor nas 'di skad ces bsgrags so/ /grong khyer dang / yul sna tshogs

nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po yangs pa can na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig /lhung bzed 'di ni lhung bzed bzang po yin te/ 'dir byin nam shin tu byin nam/ gang gis 'dir blugs pa byas pas 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / brtson

pa che ba dang / rgya che bar 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / der dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che gzhan de dag kyang rnyed cing thob nas de la longs spyod cing gser dngul gyis rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ 'dul

ba las te/ spang ba'i ltung byed dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang / sangs rgyas kyis bshad par gtogs pa dang / gtsug na nor bu'i mdo sde dang / lung ring po dang / tshul khrims kyi phung por gtogs pa dang / lung bar ma dang / zung du gtogs pa dang /

sra brkyang gi mdo sde dang / gcig las 'phros pa'i lung dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga par gtogs pa de dag las so/ /gang las brten/ drug sde dang / dge slong gzhan dag dang / khyim na gnas pa dag las te/ gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi bcu pa mdo sde las 'das/

'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang

snyoms su gzhag gam/ des tshe dang ldan pa da song la phyogs tshol cig dang / ngas chos bzhin du grogs bya'o zhes smras pa dang / gnas brtan de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa grags pas gnas brtan thams cad 'dod pa las mnyan nas

rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs nas rab tu gnas so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer nor can na tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan g.yo ldan tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa

brgyad sgom pa zhig gnas te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas gnas brtan g.yo ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa g.yo ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa g.yo ldan la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /gnas brtan a la la zhes rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa a la la rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan yangs pa can na yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /

'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / mi mthun pas chos kyi las byas te a la la zhes rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ tsam par ro/ /gang las brten/ dge slong drug sde dag las so/ /ltung ba cir

'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa

can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa rung

ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang ba zhes bya ba ci yin zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te gzhi bcu po de dag rgyas par brjod pa dang / des tshe dang ldan pa phyogs tshol cig dang ngas chos bzhin du phyogs bya'o zhes smras so/ /de nas tshe

dang ldan pa grags pas tshe dang ldan pa g.yo ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ grong khyer sang kA sha zhes bya bar song ngo / /de'i tshe grong khyer sang kA sha zhes bya ba na tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan nor can tshe dang ldan pa kun

dga' bo dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa zhig gnas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas tshe dang ldan pa nor can gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshe dang ldan pa nor

can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gnas brtan a la la zhes rung bar bgyid par rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung ba ci yin/ gnas brtan grong khyer yangs pa can na yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams mi mthun pas chos ma

yin pa dang / 'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / mi 'thun pas chos kyi las byed de a la la zhes bya bas rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes bya ba rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ tsam par ro/ /gang las brten/ dge slong drug

sde dag las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/

de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ rjes su yi rang bas rung bar

bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bar byed zhes bya ba ci yin zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/ gzhi bcu po de dag rgyas par brjod pa dang / des song la phyogs tshol cig dang ngas chos bzhin du phyogs bya'o zhes smras so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan

pa grags pas tshe dang ldan pa nor can gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas grong khyer dmar bu can du 'ongs so/ /de'i tshe gang grong khyer dmar bu can na tshe dang ldan pa yid dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa zla sgur gnas te de dag

de'i tshe 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yid dga' la gzhi bcu po rgya cher brjod nas tshe dang ldan pa yid dga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas srug nar son pa dang /

de'i tshe srug na na tshe dang ldan pa ma pham pa gnas te/ des gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas de ma he ldan du song ba dang / de'i tshe ma he ldan na tshe dang ldan pa yang dag skyes

gnas te/ des de la yang gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas lhan cig skyes su son pa dang / de'i tshe lhan cig skyes na tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gnas te/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la yang mgo

bos phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ gnas brtan a la la zhes bya ba rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan yangs pa can na yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams mi mthun pas

chos ma yin pa dang / 'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / mi mthun pas chos kyi las byas te a la la zhes rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ tsam par ro/ /gang las brten/ drug sde las so/ /ltung

ba cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi

dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing / kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na/ de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa rung

ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam grus ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di dang por bdag gi drung du 'ongs sam snyam bsams

pa dang / ji tsam na gzhan du yang song bar mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de lam ring po nas 'ongs pas ngal so zhing de 'dug tu bcug la/ bdag phyogs tshol du 'gro'o snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa grags

pa la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa grags pa khyod lam ring po nas 'ongs pas khyod ngal so la ngas phyogs btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ de ngal sor bcug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru phyogs tshol zhing song ngo / /de nas yangs pa

can gyi dge slong rnams tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas dge slong gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa tshe dang ldan pa'i mkhan po gar song zhes dris so/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de phyogs tshol

du song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa de ci'i phyir phyogs tshol du song / tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa nged kyis ci zhig byas na des nged rnams gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya/ des rgyas par bzlas

pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de legs pa ma yin pa zhig byed de/ ston pa 'das pa de'i gsung rab la rnam pa de dang de dag gis 'tsho bar rung na nged rnams ci'i phyir tho brtsam/ de de dag las gzhan

zhig gis drang ba'i sems dang phan pa'i brlang tshig gis de dag la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ni rjes su 'thun pa ma yin pa dang / rung ba ma yin pa dang / dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pas spyod de/ des kyang bcom

ldan 'das kyi bstan pa lo stong du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes sngon thos na khyod kyis ni ma 'ongs pa'i bstan pa nyid kyang mi snang bar byed pa la zhugs pa dang / ji ltar gzhan dag kyang gang dag bslab pa lhod par zhugs shing chu bur

gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu bskyed pas/ de bas na bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir khyed rnams nges par gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed do zhes smras pa dang / de dag skrag nas spobs pa med de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas

gcig nas gcig tu song ste gtam brjod par brtsams pa/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pa ni phyogs tshol du song nas bdag cag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed na/ ci'i phyir sems las chung ngur 'dug /ji ltar bsgrub
par bya ba smros shig /de nas gcig cig gis smras pa/ ci zhig bsgrub tu yod/ gang de phyogs tshol du song na bdag cag gis kyang phyogs btsal mod/ ci'i phyir bdag cag mi gnas par bya/ gzhan zhig

gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de dang bdag cag rtsod par 'gyur bar bros te 'gro bar bya'o/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag cag gang du 'gro ste gang du song ba der yang de bzhin du nyes dmigs su 'gyur bas bzod
pa gsol bar bya'o/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis bzod pa gsol mi nus kyi dkris bzhin du 'dug go/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ de 'di ltar de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas mang po

de dag je lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / dra ba dang / phor bu dang / ska rags dag gis bsdus la phyis gar rigs par bya'o/ /gzhan zhig gis bzang ste de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/ de rnams kyis de dag la kha cig la

ni snam sbyar byin/ kha cig la ni bla gos byin/ kha cig la ni mthang gos byin/ kha cig la ni rngul zan byin/ kha cig la ni gding ba byin/ kha cig la ni lhung bzed byin/ kha cig la ni chu tshags byin te/ de bzhin du de

dag thams cad bsdus nas de dag bar na gnas par gyur to/ /ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa grags pa rim gyis phyogs btsal nas yangs pa can du 'ongs pa dang / de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas dag 'ongs nas

yangs pa can dag gi drung du ma song bar der lam gyi ngal bso ba dang / lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po phyogs de dag btsal tam/ bu phyogs de dag ring por mi thogs par 'ong ngo / /mkhan po

'tshal to/ /thugs de lta bu kun bzlog pa'i rigs te/ ston pa 'das pa de'i gsung rab la rnam pa de dang de dag gis 'tsho bar rung na/ ci'i slad du de dag la gnod pa bgyi/ des bsams pa/ 'di dag sngon ma byung ba'i

tshig ci smra ste/ nges par 'di dag gis de dag las rang gir bya ba blangs par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sngon ma byung ba'i tshig smra ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gis de dag las bdag gir bya ba blangs so zhes smras pa dang /

de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas ji ltar gros byas pa de dag la smras pa/ bslab pa lhod pa'i phyogs dag 'phel bas rings par 'ong bar rigs pas bstan pa'i dgos pa la bshol bar
ma byed cig ces tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gang gis bshol bar bya ba rings byed rigs pa shol byed pa/ /tshul bzhin bya ba rab spangs byis pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gro/ /de ni grags pa med pa'i skal
ldan grogs kyis rnam par spangs/ /de yi don ni mi 'phel mar gyi ngo yi zla ba bzhin/ /gang gis dgongs pa de bzhin rigs byed blo ldan mi shol ba/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa spangs mkhas pa de ni bde ba

'thob/ /de ni grags pa skal ldan grogs po rnams kyis spangs mi 'gyur/ /de yi don ni 'phel ba yar gyi ngo yi zla ba bzhin/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa 'khor gyi khyams su zhugs te rab kyi mthar phyin
pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas smon nas shes pa brtags te/ gaN DI de brdungs pa dang / dgra bcom pa bdun brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba de dag thams cad kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo

dang lhan cig gnas pa dag 'dus so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa zla sgur 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gaN DI'i sgra ma thos so/ /de'i tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dus shing tshogs pa dang / tshe

dang ldan pa grags pas de dag ni ming nas phyung ste brjod na ni 'khrug pa chen por 'gyur bas ma la bdag gis ming nas mi 'byung bar brjod par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ des ji ltar rgan rims su 'dud pa byas nas

rgan pa'i mtha' logs su thal mo sbyar ba byas nas stan la 'dug go/ /dgra bcom pa bdun brgyar gcig gis ma tshang bas don du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa zla sgur yang 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa
las langs te/ de la lha zhig gis 'phags pa zla sgur ci'i phyir thugs las chung ngus bzhugs/ khyod dang mkhan po gcig pa dgra bcom pa bdun brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba ni yangs pa can na bstan pa gnas

par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par sdud par byed pas rings par bzhud cig ces smras pa dang / des rdzu 'phrul gyis grong khyer dmar bu can nas mi snang bar gyur te/ yangs pa can du phyin nas 'khor gyi khyams kyi sgor

'dug ste sgo la brdungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis khyod su yin zhes dris so/ /des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag dmar bu can na gnas pa yi/ /dge slong mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin/ /de dag las
ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/ /dbang po dul zhes bya ba sgo na 'dug /dge slong dag gis smras pa/ dbang po dul ba ni gzhan dag kyang yod na khyod su yin smros shig /des yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/

gang dag dmar bu can na gnas pa yi/ /dge sbyong mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin/ /de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/ /the tshom bcad ces bya ba sgo na 'dug /dge slong dag gis the tshom bcad pa ni gzhan dag
kyang yod do zhes smras pa dang / des yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag dmar bu can na gnas pa yi/ /dge sbyong mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin/ /de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/ /
'gyod pa med ces bya ba sgo na 'dug /dge slong dag gi 'gyod pa med pa ni gzhan dag kyang yod na su yin zhes smras pa dang / des yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag dmar bu can na gnas pa yi/ /
dge sbyong mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin/ /de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/ /zla sgur zhes bya ba ni sgo na 'dug /dge slong rnams kyis legs par 'ongs sam legs par 'ongs sam/ nang du

zhugs shig ces smras pa dang / de nang du zhugs so/ /de nas dge slong rnams 'khor gyi khyams nas byung nas tshe dang ldan pa zla sgur don du gnyer bar bskor te/ de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi khyams su zhugs nas
'di ltar rang rang gi stan la 'dug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pas de bzhin rgan rims su 'dug pa la dngos po bcu bzlas par zhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dag a la la zhes rung bar byed pa rung ngam/
tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar dge slong kha cig mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang / 'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / mi mthun pas chos
kyi las byas te a la la zhes rung bar bgyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ tsam par ro/ /gang las brten/ dge slong drug sde dag las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ nyes byas

so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi

dge slong 'di rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su bsgrags nas kun du spyod rab tu spyod de/ de dag bdag cag gis dor bar bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni der bas te gzhan dag zhu bar bgyi'o/ /rjes
su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bas rung bar byed pa ci yin zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du gzhi bcu po rgyas par

brjod do/ /de dag gis yang dag par brjod nas 'khor gyi khyams nas byung ste/ yang gaN DI brdungs nas yangs pa can na gnas pa'i dge slong dag dris pa'i tshig gis bsdus nas de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dug pa dang /

tshe dang ldan pa grags pas de ltar rgan rims su 'dug pa la gzhi bcu po ming nas phyung ste bzlas pa bya bar zhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dag a la la zhes bya ba rung bar byed pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung bar byed pa zhes

bya ba ci yin/ tshe dang ldan pa dag yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang / 'thun pas chos ma yin pa dang / mi mthun pas chos kyi las byas te/ a la la zhes bya ba rung bar bgyid do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/ /gang du bcas/ tsam par ro/ /gang las brten/ dge slong drug sde dag las so/ /ltung ba cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba
las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde la mi 'jug /'dul ba la mi snang / chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su

bsgrags nas kun tu spyod pa rab tu spyod de de dag bdag cag gis dor bar bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni der bas te 'di zhu bar bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag rjes su yi rang bas rung bar byed pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa

rjes su yi rang bas rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod do/ /de dag bdag cag gis dor bar bya'o zhes dgra bcom pa bdun brgyas yang dag par brjod pas bdun

brgyas yang dag par brjod pa/ bdun brgyas yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/ /bar sdom ni/ a la la dang rjes su yi rang spyod pa dang / /brtags pa dang ni lan tshwa dag dang lam dang ni/ /

sor mo gnyis kyis rung dang dkrugs dang gding ba dang / /gser dngul byas pa 'di ni bar sdom yang dag bsdus/ /grong khyer yangs pa can dang nor can dang / /lha las babs dang de bzhin dmar bu can/ /srug na

dang ni ma he ldan pa dang / /lhan cig skyes gyur pa ni phyi ma yin/ /thams cad 'dod dang grags dang g.yo ldan dang / /nor can dang ni yid dga' dag dang yang / /zla sgur dang ni de bzhin ma pham pa/ /yang dag byung dang nam gru la stsogs

pa'o/ /'dir 'grel pa las sgo brgyad pa'o zhes sgo brgyad car tshang bar byas so/ /'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / d+har+m+ma shrI pra b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal 'byor gyis bsgyur// //
'dul ba lung phran tshegs kyi gzhi 'di sgyur ba'i dus sulo ts+tsha ba mang pos dum bu mang por bgos te so sor tha dad du bsgyur bas glegs bam du sdom pa'i dus su gnas tha dad du 'thor nas ma tshang

bzhin du bsdebs pas lung phran tshegs phal che ba ma tshang bar bzhugs pa la/ slad kyis la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang du gnas brtan dar ma seng ges lung sde bzhi bzhengs pa'i tshe dge ba'i bshes
gnyen 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhing mo che ba byang chub seng ges phyag len mdzad nas spyir dbus gtsang gi gtsug lag khang rnams na bzhugs pa dang / khyad par du bsam yas mchims phu nas dgas chung ba dang /
dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis rnyed pa'i lung rnams dpe yon dang 'bad rtsol chen pos 'tshal te/ de dag la gtugs pas lung phran tshegs kha cig la mi bzhugs pa/ kha cig la bzhugs
pa rnams kyis bskangs nas bsabs pa ni bam po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i dbu sman chen po'i gtam rgyud kyi skabs nas/ sman chen pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na skyugs shig dang bden nam brdzun

blta'o zhes smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbu/ ji tsam na de grong khyer nas byung ba dang / bram ze mong rtul zhes bya bas gos kyi mtha' ma nas 'jus nas zhes bya ba'i bar du bam po
gcig chad pa bskangs/ /sdom ni/ nga yang sman gyis de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i 'og tu yig tshar gcig chad pa bskangs/ de nas bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i smad ne tso spyod gsal gyi skabs
rdzogs pa'i/ e ma'o 'di ltar khyod mkhas pa sha stag dang phrad pa ni bsod nams dang ldan no zhes smras so/ /zhes bya ba nas bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i stod/ /spyi'i sdom ni/ dge slong ma'i

bkur sti bri zhes bya ba'i bar du bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i smad nas bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i stod kyi bar bam po dgu chad pa bskangs/ sdom tshig de'i 'og tu sdom tshig yig tshar gcig chad pa bskangs/ de

nas bam po bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'i mjug bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gi gleng gzhi'i skabs kyi/ dge sbyong rnams kyi yon po'i spyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no zhes bya ba nas/ bam po

bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i dbu/ de nas de'i tshe bram ze pad ma'i snying po khyim mchog gi sa mthon po zhig na shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rnams dang lhan cig 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du
bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa chad pa bskangs so/ /de nas bam po lnga bcu pa'i mjug kun dga' bo la gdams pa'i skabs kyi/ kun dga' bo dge slong 'di lta bu ni bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs

dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan dang / skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba nas bam po lnga bcu gnyis pa'i stod/ /bar sdom ni/ tsa pa la dang tshe'i
'du byed mdzad ces bya ba'i bar du bam po gcig chad pa bskangs te/ spyir bsdoms na bam po bcu gnyis dang / sdom tshig yig tshar gnyis chad pa bskangs pa gang yin pa de nyid gangs can gyi rgyud kyi
gnas brtan chen po sdom brtson mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur cing / 'dul ba dang / mdo sde dang / sde snod kyi ma mo 'dzin pa shAkya'i dge slong shes bya'i nam mkha' la
mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas shing / snyan grags kyi 'od zer gyis phyogs kun tu khyab par gyur pa mchims thams cad mkhyen pas/ la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang nas dpe phyi gdan drangs nas

bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang du lung sde bzhi tshang la dag par bzhengs shing / de nyid la dpe phyi byas shing / khyad par du'ang ma tshang ba kha bskangs pa'i phran tshegs de nyid

la dpe phyi byas nas shAkya'i dge sbyong 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bzhengs pa'i bka' 'gyur dpe phyi la/ gdan drangs nas/ dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sde yis/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas

par bya ba'i phyir/ thub pa chen po'i bka'/ lung gzhi dang / dge slong pha ma'i rnam 'byed rnam pa gnyis dang / gzhung bla ma rnams kyi ma tshang ba kha bskong bar byed pa'i lung phran tshegs 'di dag cing tshang bar dpal gung
thang gi gtsug lag khang du bzhengs so/ /slad nas lung bzhengs pa rnams kyis kyang bam po'i grangs dbu nas rim pa bzhin du bgrangs 'di bzhin du bri bar bya'o// //
